 yes ; i have be work and live in london for more than 1 year under a highly skilled migrant programme ( hsmp ) and i subsequently switch to tier 1 ( general ) . bear in mind - i get my visa way before the uk recession and job be easy to come by . now unemployment be a big issue here . you wo n't be able to renew the tier 1 visa without a skilled job . anyways ; it be unlawful to reject your application if you : - 1 ) have meet the minimum 75 point 2 ) can proof that you meet the required english standard 3 ) have minimum fund of gbp2800 . 4 ) obviously ; you must not have any prior criminal conviction or have previously abuse your immigration status ( i.e . overstay on a visa ; outstanding fine in uk ; etc ) do n't bother apply if you do n't meet the above . for me ; application to approval take 3 week ; apply from kl ; malaysia . for precise requirement and how point be calculate ; see http : //www.ukvisas.gov.uk/en/howtoapply/infs/inf21pbsgeneralmigrant # 6375036 good luck . ~live like there 's no tommorrow~

 the tier 1 general visa be for 24 month only . to extend your stay beyond 24 month you must renew it . you wo n't be able to do so without a job . as far a i know ; you must have at least a bachelor 's degree and that 's how they accept that you be 'highly skilled ' . they want original document ; no copy . do n't worry they will return these to you . bank statement - late 3 month show minimum of gbp2800 and must be original a well . toefl be accept ; mark must be 110-120 ( internet base test ) . you must also provide the original cert and test score . ~live like there 's no tommorrow~

 hi airlines will not charge you extra for a car seat and travel cot . i have travel the uk ; south africa and switzerland and i have always be able to take my stroller ; car seat and travel cot with me at no extra charge . phone the airline and find out !
 definitely phone the airline . the baggage rule have change a lot and we nearly get stung for us $ 525 for three bag earlier this month . as recently a october 2008 you could fly from the u.s. to doha on qatar airways without the carseats count toward your baggage requirement at all . in other word ; you be allow two bag per passenger . . .so if there be two adult and two ( pay ) kid then you be allow eight bag plus the two car seat . but no longer . . .now you would be allow six bag plus two car seat . anything over that cost us $ 175 *per bag* . we learn this the hard way ; so it 's not an urban legend for u : (
 oh - and to answer your question ( sorry 'bout that ! ) i be not aware of any company that hire them out . car seat ; in particular ; be generally not use outside of the expatriate crowd . : ( you can find what you need at the city center babyshop store ; but depend on your luggage situation it might just make sense to bring it with you .

 consular service for greek national cyprus embassy in doha be represent the consular interest and diplomatic protection of greek national who live and work in qatar since there be no greek embassy in the country . greek national can certify document ; signature and ask for a permanent resident certificate . the price for the certification be 5 ( around qr40 depend on exchange rate ) also cyprus embassy keep a mailing list where greeks and cypriots who live and work in qatar be encourage to register . the mailing list be update daily and every effort be make for the best accuracy . the embassy distribute security information when necessary and other important information to the registered national . the greek ambassador to qatar be the ambassador of greek embassy in kuwait . since cyprus have not start issue shengen visa yet ; visa application for greece be be process by the embassy of france . for more information please contact the consular section of the embassy . check this link ; http : //www.mfa.gov.cy/mfa/embassies/embassy ? opendocument

 the first answer be outdated - it should be delete . there be a greek embassy in qatar and it hour be 10-12 daily except fridays . location opposite the doha exibition center . if you be drive from city center and make a u-turn at the doha exibition center round about . in about 400 meter make a right turn . once you make the right ; follow through - maybe the second right and another right till you see some van belong to a construction office . you will find the greek embassy close to them . 412 8150 greek embassy phone number
 from what i know ; you will be ban from qatar if your employment do not give a release and you will have to wait for at least two year to go back to qatar .
 if you get the no objection certificate from current sponsor u can enter in doha with valid visa
 your sponsor can ban you for lifetime ; 5 year and minimum 2 year .this 2 year ban be by govt.it be common for anybody who cancel rp and go out.more than 2 yrs ban your sponsor have to show solid reason to mini of interior and it be very hard for employer . now if you want to return before 2 year ; noc be requried from old sponsor.if you carry noc with you at time of dept ; it need to be endorse by immigration and this endorsement will expire automaticaly after 6 months.in that case your new employer have to get another one to get your new visa . but wait ; ; ; ; ; ; ; which visa be you ? some type of visa do not need 2 year bar .
 if u hv noc u can come ; make sure you get ur rp cancel by your current company before leave ; make sure you have not cross 3 month of expiry of rp . why do n't you get sponsorship change since u have release . good luck ! ! !

 gratuity -40 day of basic salary he will get ; since he work 4 year .
 per qatar labor law : 21 day basic salary be gratuity for each year work . 4 year * 21 day * last daily basic pay = gratuity amount
 1-calculation of gratuity a per qatar labor law be 21 day basic salary of each year . if u work 5 year or more it will become 1 month basic salary instead of 21 day . 2 . each year u have a right to get 21 day leave salry ; if u not get in previous year ; u can claim for this also . 3 . all of the calculation base on the last basic salary u get . eg . suppose on the time of ur join ur basic salary be 5000 and now u r get the basic salary 7500 ; the calculation be base on the last one measns 7500 . 4 . if ur contract be defenit contract u should give 2 week notice inform ur resignation . if ur contact be indefinit duration contact u must give 1 month notice about ur resignation . other wise they can deduct 1 month salary or remain balance of day salary from ur settlement .
 about resignation ? one of my friend be work here in qatar for 4 year ; he be plan to resign and go back to his country of origin.he be ask do the company will give any seperation pay ? if yes ; how be it to be compute ? lenght of service or whatsoever ?
 he will get only gratuity that 21 day per year a per the last drawn basic ; apart from that legally nothing

 14 ; 500 be a good salary and the bonus be a plus ; u will be pay the rent per month for a 2 bedroom fully furnish apartment between 7000 to 8000 qr ; around 300 for water and electricity bill ; then monthly budget for grocery approx . 1000 to 1500. so all in all maximum 10 ; 000 qr ; so will be save around 5 ; 000qr at least.u can save more depend on the life style u choose . life in qatar be good ; peaceful ; free of worry . so do n't worry take a chance ; it a good opportunity .
 you can find 1bhk semi furnish brand new flat include water and electricity in doha at qrs 3500-4000 per month . grocery ; 1000- 1500 qrs . petrol and other maintenance ; 300-500 if you have an economy car in good condition . telephone and internet ; 250-500 . so total monthly expense will come around 6500 - 7000 maximum . you can save half of your salary if you have a good plan . good luck go ahead this be a good job offer if the company and project be real .
 for single it be okay . but for married you wo n't be save anything . 1000-1500 living expense be good for one person only . house rent and food will eat most of your salary . transportation or car maintenance and education fee be an additional burden to your meagre salary .

 how do he get a qatari driving license ( permanent ) without have a residence permit and id ?
 cherukkan ; he might have get the temporary dl and be confuse . they will not issue permanent dl without rp and id . a person on visit visa will not have a permanent dl of qatar and will not be able to buy a car .
 car transfer one of my friend be on visit visa in qatar ; he get permanent qatari driving license ; can he buy car on his name though he dont have residence visa ?
 please get your fact straight a you can not get a permanent drivers license without an rp . the license be link to your qid and bear the same number .
 the license be connect to the qatari id.. if the visa be cancel the license will have no meaning a well.. he be drive at his own risk similar to not have a license.. if he get a new sponsor and get a new qatari id he will again need to apply for a new license to be link to that new id .

 either one of you can sponsor ; no issue ; check with your pro about the formality .
 it 'll be easiest if the man sponsor the child - le question and raise eyebrow . birth certificate from hamad/nha ; passport from embassy ; then get the rp .

 dude before you purchase hdmi cable double check the following : 1- what hdmi ver your plasma and video device be support ? you will notice that there be v1.03 and low version . 2- what resolution your plasma and video device have ? not all hdmi can transmi 1080p resolution . 3- if you have special feature like vieara link ( control ) etc ; make sure that you purchase the cable from the same manifacturer for compatibility issue . where to buy : 1- high end place : techno q - salwa road - 4689494 - expensive but the best quality . 2- virgin mega store 3- carefour

 hi ; i be a mother of a 6 yr old boy and be look for a good school in doha . i recently get a call for an opening for my son at sherborne.i be confuse a i have also hear about asd that it also a very good school . as yr child be in sherborne ; can you please let me know how the school be ? should i opt for sherborne or wait for asd to reply ? how be the teacher at sherborne ? hows the atmosphere ? be u satisfy ? please let me know your feedback . i will really appreciate . thanks ;
 sherborne qatar be a school run a a business making profit . it be own by one of the al-thani mob . there be lot of problem with this school . many higly experienced teacher leave after just one year and a another teacher recently quit . they have try to set up a british prep school in the desert - it just do not work . few of the remain staff have much international experience - most of them be snobby type from the uk with little overseas experience or knowledge about arab custom . the organisational of the school be poor - reactionary management . contact with the head be limit . they have a board of govenors make up of pompous type . there be very few decent school option in qatar and it look like that sherborne qatar will never live up to the advertised promise . avoid for now - far too many problem relate to cultural adjustment .

 susan chang ; you make lot of claim but what be your proof ? do you have or do you have a child at sherborne ? my personal experience a a qualified teacher ; who have support many of the student at sherborne ; have be very positive . in fact i be sceptical about how well a new school could do in it first year . i have be quite surprise by what they have achieve so far both academically and in term of student ' holistic development .
 my proof be that i be friend with several teacher and family currently at the school or who have recently leave . i stand by all i have say . there be really no decent school in qatar . it be absurd to think you can set up a british prep school in the middle of the desert . the whole operation be a business shum run for money - a profit making venture trading upon a famous name . there be a bunch of pompous uk govenors who have a lot of egg on their face at the moment and be do everything to avoid swallow their pride . the only reason the majority of the teaching staff do not leave last year be because they be grant a 10 % lump cash sum payment to basically remain hush and avoid speak out . what more would you like to know ? the only reason the school survive it first year be because of the teacher ; not for any other reason . the same can be say for many if not all the school in qatar .
 quite frankly any school in doha indirectly help to sustain a corrupt system of government ( a family dynasty ) ; that directly depend on the mass importation of hundred of thousand of poor people from country like nepal ; bangladesh ; india and pakistan . these people be totally exploit and treat like modern day slave . they survive on about 800 qr a month . no school in doha can deny that they indirectly help to sustain such a system . that be why i say that there be no good school in doha . their moral foundation be corrupt . it have nothing to do about ivy league university . decent people should get out of this sham of a country . sherborne uk have jump into bed with a corrupt family and have have their finger badly burn . they now lack integrity and all that they propose they stand for back in the uk .
 we move from dubai too and my kid be go to the same school ; they seem to be alright however i be not quite sure about how strong be they in their acadamics
 but use your own logic ; you and your husband job ( or you emotionally support your husband decision to work here in qatar ) be sustain your employer ; who in turn ; be `` sustain corrupt family monarchy who deny their citizen and visitor basic human right and freedom '' . therefore the only logical option open to you be to leave . this be the first time i have suggest that anyone should leave qatar - but unfortunately this be the corner you have paint yourself into .
 first of all ; the only reason sherborne establish a branch here because it 's part of the supreme council of education `` education for a new era '' outstanding schools initiative . which be a rand initiative ( if you know what i mean ) .so far ; qatari student account for less than 10 % of the total number of student . most qataris enroll their offspring in government school . overall ; private school target expatriate who work here ; and the fact be most of the expatriate who enroll their offspring in private school receive education allowance from their employer and let 's be honest ; most of you wish deep inside that your country be a monarchy . the immigrant be suck your resource dry ; degrading your national health & education system . despite all that your salary be deduct a tax to pay for the welfare of those immigrant . and yet ; you get to pay for utility ; )
 hello genesis ; would you adopt a affirmative or negative viewpoint ? schools like sherborne have put into place racially discriminatory quota system of not enrol more than 20 % qatari student ; not 10 % a you do suggest . of course sherborne can get away with this in qatar and would never be able to implement such an unfair policy back in the uk . your paragraph about immigrant suck the national health and education system dry be sheer nonsense . a simple and poorly worded opinion without evidence or substance . as for adley ; i be pleased that you have manage to reach some sort of conclusion . i really think that all highly trained western expats include yourelf should leave qatari ; not just me ! more debate be require .
 school demographic be an issue in the uk just as much a it be in qatar . it be difficult to maintain a high standard of learn if a large proportion of student in a classroom be not fluent in the language of instruction . the way most private school in the uk address this issue be by set a limit on the percentage of non-native speaker of english . otherwise ; the majority of the population in these school would consist of indian and chinese student . this be because of the sheer volume of applicant from these two country . in qatar those school ; with a small population of first language english speaker ; such a qis and al-jazeera academy ; tend not achieve the same standard a those with more first language speaker . this do not mean that those student who be not fluent in english be less able but it do show that not be fluent in a language can be a barrier to learning .
 academic integrity of school 2 effectiveness of administration 2 academic and disciplinary support provide 2 director 's involvement in academic 2 fair and equitable treatment by board and director 2 school have adequate educational material on hand 5 attitude of local community towards foreigner 5 cost of living in relation to salary ( 10= most favorable ) 3 satisfaction with housing 2 community offer a variety of activity 6 availability and quality of local health care 6 assistance with visa ; shipping and air travel 1 extra curricular load be reasonable 5 comments : sheikha aisha own and operate this substandard 'international ' school . do n't be fool ; it 's an international school in theory but an islamic school for delinquent al thani child . all the student that have be expel or refuse entrance to another school know they can attend doha academy . mr. farouk ; head of the secondary school ; be abully who rule through intimidation . he have his minion who follow him around like hungry puppy hop that he 'll throw a bone their way . anyone who dare to stand up to him be a target of his . he derive immense pleasure in humiliate and demoralize student . how this man be ever appoint in a school boggle the mind . sheikha aisha ; the owner/operator ; be notorious for not honor contract . foolishly i think that once a contract be agree to and sign ; it would be honor . not so . she have blatantly break contract because she decide she do n't want to pay airfare . the sheikha be a dishonest ; disreputable woman who be only after two thing ; money and prestige . she 's get plenty of cash from the parent but refuse to reinvest it in the school . working for sheikha aisha be a miserable experience . now that she have turn the day to day operation over to mr. ali a head of secondary girls and mr. farouk a head of secondary boy ; the school will take a dramatic downward spiral . ( as an aside ; both mr. ali and mr. farouk have in the past be take to the police for assault on student . these assault take place during normal school hour . members of staff intervene in order to stop the altercation from become a brawl . yet ; they remain thanks to the sheikha . ) unless you want to work for and be sponsor by a woman who have zero integrity ; no qualm about break a contract and no ethic ; run a million kilometer in the opposite direction . no one of any repute should ever consider work at this school .

 guys to check if there be a cable problem try go to www.pingtest.net and do a ping test . click on begin test and let it choose a good server automatically . check your packet loss ; if high then cable issue . then to check your download and upload speed go to www.speedtest.qa . i have some problem with mine ; then change the router and also find out my connection be downgrade from 4mb to 1mb and take them 2 week to fix that ; but it all good now .

 just to give you a brief idea about living cost in qatar ; take a good look at these fact : 1- rent of a 1 bedroom apartment in a mid-class area be from 3 ; 500 up to 4 ; 500 qar per month . sharing an apartment with someone else may save you around 1 ; 000-1 ; 500 qar per month . 2- renting a small car ( 1500 cc ) be around 1 ; 500-1 ; 700 qar per month . 3- food cost for a single per month be around 800-1 ; 500 qar depend on what you eat and drink . the previous number increment if you drink alcohol . 4- going out on weekend cost around 200-300 qar depend on what you do ( that 's about 800-900 qar per month ) . 5- water and electricity bill be around 300 qar per month . any extra service like mobile and internet be at about 250 qar each ( that 's another 500 qar per month ) . need i continue ... ? ! i do n't think so . ********************************* < b > < i > obstacles be what you see when you set your eye off the goal .

 you should call the traffic police and inform them about the accident to enable them to see the accident ( but dont block the road if it be a minor accident ) or both of the vehicle should be take to the near traffic departmen . in this case both party should agree who be responsible for the accident .
 1 ) call 999 if you be on the accident spot ! 2 ) in case the accident be minor and fault be accept by either one ; then you both may directly go to the near police station and you will get the report instantly . if third party be not involve in the accident & you damage the car by yourself ; you can follow the same procedure # 2 above .
 police report what be the process for get police report for accident ?
 you go to police station ; bring your document and get a police report . possible you need to take a number ? but that 's the procedure .
 this be what happened.. on the 26th of january this guy be in a reverse and he hit me.. he admit his fault and tell me whatever the damage he would pay.. i think that police report be not need because we both agree but i be wrong.. do i still need the detail of his land cruiser ? he give me his number and he be such a nice guy he would stick by his word but the service center say they wont fix a thing without a police report ? i need the location and office timing please .
 i think you need to go to the police station locate in the area of the accident . talk to the guy who hit your car ; and agree on a time for meeting at the police station.i think both of you should be present at the station . explain the situation ; you may need to pay a fee for paper work ; and they may call you the following day for the report . take your id ; id copy ; istimara ; and insurance document with you . make sure that you clear any of your early radar fine ; to get the report .
 call that guy ( who hit your car ) ; and tell him that you will meet in the police traffic division- the near police traffic division be the accident take place ; to whatever time you be both two comfortable of ; since the traffic division be 24hrs ; except i think there be no office during friday and saturday.. and if a you say the guy be the culprit then he should pay 100 plus 20qr for the report ; and you a the victim will also pay 20qr for the report.. after that check with your arabic friend who can read and interpret the report ( since the report be type in arabic ) ; ask them what be the name of the insurer of the car who hit you ; and google their contact nos ; lastly go directly to their office ( insurer ) and give them the police report.. and the they will give you the detail on what you will do next.. i hope that help ...

 it can work but the danger be to re-gain the weight once you go back to your normal diet . if you just want to loose a few kilo to get inside a dress why not ( but our body do not like very much this kind of game : - ) . for a healthy diet ; change your way of eating by take out the extra ( extra quantity ; extra sugar and fat ) and add the good one ( fruit ; vegetable and exercise ) . you may not loose weight a quickly but it will last . check your bmi kg/m2 ( body mass index ) ; decide what bmi you want to reach ( to be healthy and/or to fell good ) and allow you some time to reach it . http : //en.wikipedia.org/wiki/body and whatever you do ( diet ; exercise ) ; you have to enjoy it ; if not one day or another you will swap to your old habit : - )
 do n't replace your meal with special k. it be high in sugar and be make from simple white flour . if you insist on eat cereal instead of a normal meal then try eat one that reduce it sugar slowly . i.e . le refined and more complex carbohydrate . dorset muesli for example with nut and unprocesses grain . with the simple carbs in special k you will just get an insulin spike and feel hungry soon after . generally if you want to lose weight then reduce your carbohydrate and increase green vegetable . so less potato ; rice ; pasta and as much green vegetation a you can manage .

 yes ; you can and they can ... qatar do n't ban single woman from work . the issue would be not with your gender but with your visa . since you 're on the visit visa you need to find job/company that will provide with the residence permit before your current visa expires or else a fine of 200qr/day for overstay . good luck !
 yes u can ;
 surely ummarried girl can work but the fact be that since ur visa be visit visa u have 2 first chng ur visa status 2 a firm then only u cn work becaus emost of the firm prefer female with family sponsorship ie husband/father status .

 what be arafat ? to be clear . it 's my first year here and i work in the public sector . i need to know what day i get off . i have hear it be three work day . please can somebody confirm the date .
 some people wo n't get any day off ( worker in shop ; domestic worker ; taxi driver etc ) . some people will get 1 or 2 day off . some people will get 10 day off . it just depend who you be and whether your manager like you . there be no hard and fast rule about who will definitely get a certain number of day off .
 i agree that be the case in reality . however ; qatari labour law ( law 14 ) do make specific provision for eid al-adha holiday . for private sector work it state that you should get 3 work day off . if your manager insist on you work those day ; then you be entitle to 150 % of your salary for those day . i do n't want to resight labour law ; a these law be not always adhere to . i just want to know which 3 day this will be this year if your manager just so happen to be a really nice guy and give you the day off a per the 3 day requirement .

 same here ; my educ cert be really require for the processing of the work visa . got my cert attest by the phil embassy and after by mofa here in doha . but the p.e . can only accept it for attestation if it have red ribbon from dfa and the dfa authentication require educational cert to be attest by ched . long process but it 's a must requirement . ; d might it help to ask your company again whether it ok to do the attestation in phil embasssy and mofa in dubai ? or a what mention above ; try to inquire p.e . in dubai . if so ; would they need the orig copy ? because it 's kinda a risky to send it via courier unless you personally hand it over to your company.. ? hope this help .
 be careful.. do not ever surrender the original red ribboned education certificate stamp by phil embassy & mofa -qatar ... you be require to submit a copy only ... make sure you have also copy the stamp from phil embassy & mofa-qatar ... the labor dept of qatar do not require the original ... you will only have to show them the original but they will not take it from you ... keep the original with you ... the red ribboned educ certificate have no expiration contrary to what other filipino say ... remember it 's not that easy to get authenticated document ... moreover ; you will also need authenticated nbi clearance ( red ribboned & stamp by phil embassy & mofa-qatar ) .. this time you can surrender the original a the nbi clearance itself be valid only for 1 year ...

 hi ; look if you want to go to egypt by car you need to do triptek from here since your car have a qatari plate number . i go to lebanon twice ; first i go without a triptek but it be a lot of headache especially at syria border ; since i need to pay twice on the border . one when i enter and pas to lebanon and another time when i leave lebanon come back to qatar through syria border . i advise you to do a triptek but you need a qatari guy to sponsor you ... enjoy your trip : )
 hi friend hope u will have a safe trip to egypt . yes ; u need to get a trip ticket book from qatar rive club in c ring road with a qatari sponsorship . for ur car be still under installment ; no problem to leave qatar but do n't ask the bank to give u a letter to leave qatar with ur car . also ; u must have a valid qatari license and u must make car insurance in the saudi border and it will cost u 75/00 saudi riyal per trip . u have two way to reach egypt . 1a- thru deba to hurghada by a high speed fairy boat and the trip will last for 4 hour approx . 1b- thru deba to safaga and it will take about 12hours and i dont prefer it . 2- thru jordan from al aqaba to sharm el sheikh and the trip will take about 6 hours by sea . i hope that the above information be useful to u and it will help u to take the right direction .

 hi leaders23 impressive to read that you have do this journey twice ; would it be possible for you to share your experience ( short trip report ) with u ? thanks mandm
 i read this thread while research the triptic requirement for my drive from doha to london . now that i be back in london i think i can dispel some of the myth . i drive from doha through saudi ; jordan ; syria ; turkey ; greece ; italy ; germany and holland before take a ferry to the uk . the car have a qatari number plate . saudi first ; you do not need a triptic ; just a visa ( transit in my case ) which be usually valid for 3 day . there be nowhere to buy a triptic anywhere near the jordan border . jordan ; there be no need for a triptic or advance visa . this can be buy at the border along with car insurance . syria ; there be no need for a triptic . i have a visa from the syrian embassy in doha . insurance can be buy at the border . turkey ; there be no need for a triptic . visa can be buy at the border along with car insurance . greece ; no triptic requirement ; insurance can be buy at the border and cover the whole eu for one month . having enter the eu ; there be no further visa ; insurance or triptic requirement . egypt have a triptic requirement but be a nightmare to drive in . i would recommend leave the car in aqaba and take the ferry to nuweiba ; where coach operate to cairo .
 note mj : )
 near sofitel hotel

 how to reach shabeer ka hotel and sara pakistani restaurant ? new in city ; can somebody guide me how can i reach to shabeer ka hotel aka jamaal al jamaal restaurant and sara pakistani restaurant ? how can i reach these place if i be come from c ring road ramada intersection towards jaida flyover ? will be grateful
 if you 're come from the home centre ( on your left ) do n't go on the jaida flyover ; go straight towards 'the centre ' on side road & before the end of the flyover ; turn right to the freeq bin mahmood ... go straight ... pas traffic signal ... now from the 2nd t/signals ; turn leave ... then first turn to right get into a narrow street ... after some 100 meter the hotel be on your left ... its a small dhaba type place & the name be jamaal al jamaal restaurant . hope it understandable ...

 31 week pregnant and travel hello all you moms out there ; i will be travel soon back home on a direct 3.5 hour flight with qatar airways ; any word of advise ; recommendation ; any special request i should ask qatar airway etc ... .
 im not a mum ; but as far a qr procedure go ; i know ... upto the end of the 32nd week you will need a qualified doc certificate . 33rd upto the end of 35th week you will need qualified docs certificate and this will need to be approve by the qr doc . from the beginning of the 36th week you will not be allow to travel on qr .
 please request in a front passenger seat if you be book to economy if you be in business class then much well a you can relax well . take care : )
 oh and all what i say be for pregnancy without complication ; i.e . normal/ single .
 i be not sure about this ; but i think that qa will let you board only of you can show a med certificate state that you be not more than 28 week pregnant .
 you will need a medical certificate for this . make sure it be either from hamad or a registered practitioner like el emadi or ahli . and if they ask you at the boarding counter if you be tired ; say no - you be in very well.. they be very strict on this
 if your company be ready to give you noc why you want to leave the country ? ? ! !
 you can request for wheel chair or even the high lift ; if you want.while fly ; drink a lot of water . keep move . eat frequent and small meal portions.put belt under your tummy.you can change over to a row of three empty seat and can even take a nap ; if you want.safe journey ! safe delivery !
 i apologize for wrong entry this be a answer to another quetion regard noc and at the time my computer get stucked and open answer page to this question and after i post only i notice ; the disadvantage of this site be once you post you cant delete or modify .
 if u r really fly at this stage ; best luck for ur safe journey.. i do n't travel after 7month of my pregnancy..doctors normally do n't recommend the pregnant lady to travel after 7month..do consult ur doctor first and please please take care of urself..

 first time visa processing be normally do by the employer ( in this case your husband 's sponsor ) . however your husband be your sponsor .
 no need exit permit if your family be under your sponsership only check the validity of their resident permit
 your husband be the qp staff so qp be his sponcer a his family you have the family visa under h ( ur husband ) sponcership.you be free to find job & work here ; free to travel home anytime a you dont need any exit permit all this as long a your husband be work in qp.once he decide to leave his job or country your sponcership automatically stand cancelled & you will have to leave the country as well
 you be under sponsor of your husband ... your husband be under sponsor of qp company ... if the company will cancel the visa of your husband automatic ur visa will be cancel as well a ur son

 visit visa be limit for month which if you have if family you can stay up to 6 month in a year and if you have work visa you can stay here for 1 year
 main difference be that a visit visa holder can not work whether pay or unpaid . whiles a work visa holder can work and stay here as long a the sponsor wish . he need to renew your resident permit every year pay nominal fee .
 work visa : enables u to work for a company ( private or international ) for a period of 1-3years ( depending on ur company ) in qatar . visit visa : keeps u in the country from a period of 14days-6months ; but not empower for work purpose in qatar .
 visit visa be only limited time maximum of 6 month and legaly a visitor can not work . where a work visa you can work and duration depend for how many year sponser make residency . usually minimum for 1 year and maximum for 5 years .
 visit vs. work visa 1 . 6 month no extension 1 year renewable each year 2. purpose be to visit purpose be to work as simple a that .
 by the way work visa be also call work visit visa these day . so that make all the type of visa 'visit ' visa only ; so which type of visit visa difference you be look .

 need expert advice i have an impt question and need expert feedback . if the last day of annual leave be immediately follow by 3 day of eid holiday ; are these 3 day consider a part of annual leave ? in my company the hr dept . calculate the 3 day a extension of annual leave and hence leave without pay . is this correct a per the law ? experts pls guide .
 not all company fall under the labour law troll ; you work in the ministry you should know that . qp ; rasgas ; al jazeera etc and the rest of the government be not govern by the labour law ; they be govern by their own policy with civil law be the deciding factor . if you be on leave during a holiday ; that day be count a your annual leave . if you return from leave and resume work for one day prior to the eid holiday then it will not be count a annual leave . same go for maternity leave . annual leave be pay leave and an public holiday that fall within it be not count a extra day unless your company have specific policy in this regard .  `` diplomacy be the art of say 'nice doggie ' until you can find a rock - will rogers ''

 speech delay alone be not a sign of autism . there be other sign . i would highly recommend that you go to shafalllah centre for an assessment ; and if he be diagnose there a autistic or just speech delay ; you can go to qatar autism centre for private one-to-one session ; but this depend on your budget ; rumaila 's problem be that they have very busy schedule and they give you only one session per week and they depend on the parent to continue at home but they be support by hamad so you do not pay a lot for this session . but in qatar autism centre ; it be not support but they can give you up to 3 time a week and during the evening and not during work hour a in rumaila ! good luck !

 i doubt ... ... .let him try his luck !
 he can apply to another country in gcc if his saudi visa be cancel .
 that be why they call it gcc ; entire region of gulf country . he can apply to any gcc country except saudi with his new passport . otherwise ; noc be a requirement .
 there might be a 6 month period where he be ban in the gcc overall ; but the 2 year be only applicable in the individual gcc country .
 no ban in gcc ; only in ksa . he can still work in any other gcc ; irrespective of the ban in ksa !
 he can apply for other gcc country .
 if he be not blacklist by saudi ; he can apply
 he be not allow 'dual gcc residency ' . if he do n't cancel his saudi visa it will automatically expire 6 month after his departure and then the ban time start . if his visa be cancel by his employer it go straight into ban period ( however long that be in saudi ) . suggestion ? get a new passport to reenter another gcc country . have meet many people during my stay in qatar who have do the same .
 exit ... ... ... ... .gcc ... ... ... .. ! my friend be in saudi arabia for the one year . now under vacation in sri lanka . but he be not interested in go back to saudi due to some problem with employer . i think a per the rule he will be get exit and cant go back to saudi for next two year to work under another employer . can he apply immediately for another gcc country or the saudi exit will effect all gcc country .
 i have a couple of guy in our company who be ban ( not only cancel ) in uae and they get their qatari work visa with the same passport . only in some specific case ; the ban be impose in all the gcc ... not in all . as far a the dual gcc residency be concern ... .. i dont know about all the gcc but qatar allow you to keep both by pay a fee of qr 2000/year . the information be available on the moi 's website .

 you can do the following exercise for family visa step by step 1 . print out the visa and sent to them via e-mail 2 . on the original passport insert the visa copy ; nbi copy ; 2 x 2 picture white background 3 . advice them to go to near dhl office in your area 4. they will pay 2500 pesos for dhl charge 5 . wait for 7 work day they send you sms for collect the passport from dhl office . 6. after you receive the original passport from dhl verify the visa stamp in the passport . if ok then go through travel agency and book them accord to your wish . they have 3 month validity to enter qatar . 7 . in immigration they will ask so many question but if you tell them that your husband or wife be an engineer they will not think twice they will stamp quickly and say ok . welcome to qatar

 i cut 7 day of our 20 day itinerary we take nov last year . we have child too . day 1 - travel to malaysia day 2 - kuala lumpur - hotel breakfast - 9.00 a.m . pick up and proceed for full day tour of kuala lumpur - cultural ; city + shopping & heritage tour . places to visit include : - kings palace ( photo stop ) * independent square ( photo stop ) * national mosque ( photo stop ) - national museum * national monument ( photo stop ) * petronas twin tower ( photo stop ) - national zoo * chocolate boutique * royal selangor pewter factory - lunch and dinner . end tour transfer back to hotel . overnight . day 3 - melaka - hotel breakfast - full day tour of melaka theme park animal safari - lunch & dinner at own expense - end tour return to afamosa resort - overnight . day 4 rest and shopping day 5 kuala lumpur - hotel breakfast - 9.00 a.m. - proceed for full day tour of proceed for full day tour of sunway lagoon theme park - lunch & dinner . end tour transfer back to kuala lumpur city . - overnight hotel . day 6 kuala lumpur - hotel breakfast - 7.00 a.m. - proceed for full day tour of genting highlands theme park - lunch & dinner . end tour transfer back to kuala lumpur city . - overnight . day 7 - return to qatar

 dear lauraferns ; i 'd suggest you to watch your baby 's growth closely and at some time around 4-6 month ; you may notice that your baby be not get enough from your milk . ( this be purely subjective but you be the best person to make the decision ) . at this stage ; you can start a little ( spoonfuls ) of rice water ; egg yolk ; a few squirt of orange juice etc.. ; in the beginning and if you find that everything be go well ; then you can introduce some more new items- one a week or so . gradually you will find that your baby be enjoy all these new food . remember to keep up with the breast milk as long a possible along with these wean food . if you would like to include cereal ; you could do that too . by 1 year of age the infant should have have a taste of everything you ever want him/her to . i would advise you not to add sugar or salt additionally in any food item because you may be introduce an unwanted habit for life . good luck with the weaning . ap

 ok here be my advice . fill in qatar before you leave then fill up again just when you be leave the saudi boarder ; this will be the saudi side before the uae boarder . this should be enough for to get to abu dhabi or even dubai . because if you miss this petrol station then the next station within in uae be atleast 100km . this be from my experience of 2007 ; i dont know if they have build any more petrol station since then . also a small factor to consider be that petrol in qatar and saudi be cheap than uae . have a safe trip .
 there be many petrol station from uae-ksa border to abu dhabi
 there be a petrol station less than a kilometer after go thru the saudi border from qatar ( right side ) . there be another one a few kilometer before exit saudi to the uae ( left side ) . there be a petrol station a few kilometer after pass thru the uae border ( right side ) . this be the last petrol station along the highway before reach abu dhabi proper . keep in mind the petrol price in uae be 3x compare to saudi . i hope this help . have safe trip .

 yes it be mandatory .
 yes ; it be mandatory . you can obtain it from your embassy .
 yes dear when u change sponsorship police clearance s mandatory.u can get easily from your embassy.then u want to make stamp in foriegn ministry qatar
 a police clearance certificate ( pcc ) from your country of citizenship be mandatory during sponsorship transfer . at the indian embassy ; the pcc ( for indian nationals ) will be issue within 2 day . need to fill up the form and 2 photo and around 80 qr . this pcc then need to be stamp at the ministry of consulate affairs ( this be the same mofa but they 've shift and rename this section ; the building be on your right when travel from munthaza signal ( radwat khalil intersection ) to gulf cinema signal . this document then need to be submit to your new sponsor ; they will get a medical date for you ( yes ; it need to be do ; even if you 've do it before for the previous employer ) . when the medical result and pcc be submit to the cid ; you 'll go for fingerprinting and then in 2 week cid will either approve or deny the sponsorship change . if the sponsorship change be approve ; they will give you / your sponsor your qatar pcc . end of procedure . enjoy new job : - )
 megamart and carfor ; some local good bakery have it as well .
 100 % whole wheat bread ? where can i find in doha a 100 % whole wheat bread ?
 leelah ; there be a substantial difference between `` whole wheat '' and `` 100 % whole wheat '' . the first be bread make of a mix which include some ( usually low quantity ) of whole wheat . in carrefour and local bakery ; you can only find `` whole wheat bread '' !
 thanks all . the bakery at le cigale ; do it have 100 % whole wheat bread ?

 to my knowledge ; 100 % whole wheat bread in qatar ; be only available in import pre-packed sliced bread ; at the megamart in the centre . people here be tell you otherwise because they confuse `` whole wheat '' with `` 100 % whole wheat '' . if anyone know other source here in doha ( make sure you be talk specifically about 100 % whole wheat ) ; please let me know .

 does anyone know a company that host it website in qatar ? i 've find two : http : //www.qatar.net.qa/ - qtel http : //www.moi.gov.qa/ - ministry of interior most of the top-10 local site ( nine ; probably ) be host in usa . any others in qatar ?
 ql use to host with mediatemple ; which be base on virtualized server ; but when the traffic take off they switch to < a href= '' http : //rimuhosting.com/ '' > rimuhosting < /a > . there be now two data centre in doha . one run by qtel ; the other by meeza ; which be part of qf . i just do n't know the reason why any non-governmental website would host in either of them . i know that before ql switch to rimuhosting ; they be pay $ 100 a month for host . now ; i 'm sure they 're pay more ; but not huge amount more . both qtel and meeza be never go to be able to compete on price . nor be they go to be able to compete on support . ql be number-three in the top-10 website in qatar ; and it run on free software . < a href= '' http : //www.qatarliving.com/user/kutch '' > kutch < /a > do a great job of run the local free-software group ; but there just be n't the number of linux expert in qatar to be able to provide good support service . the other reason you might not want to host in qatar be the local legal framework . hosting in the usa be sometimes frustrating if you receive a barrage of dmca takedown notice ; but at least the law be well-documented . here ; you ca n't be sure that someone with a bit of wasta would n't make a phone call to qtel and shut you down . of course ; there might be a technical reason to host here . if you need low latency . maybe the data centre be full of company ' file server ? however ; even if i be run an system that require a low ping ; surely it 's a safe bet to host in dubai ? any example of locally host website ? ? ?

 no govern rule will work here practically . if the landlord want to increase the rent he can create any reason to send you out from his property . now no need to worry about the increse in rent . rent be come down drastically . change the house
 if you have a write contract with the owner ; and this contract be sign on or after 01/01/2005 then he have no right to increase your rent up to 14/02/2010 a per the law . if the contract be sign before 01/01/2005 then an increase shall occur a per the follow table : -rent amount less than qr 2000 > > > 20 % -rent amount between 2000-5000 > > > 15 % -rent amount between 5000-10000 > > 10 % -rent amount more than 10000 > > > > > 5 % in addition he can not kick u out unless you do not pay the monthly rent ; or if you rent the flat to others ; or if he want to use the appartment by him or his family mambers ; or if he want to demolish the building and most of the above have to be through court evidence ; ; ; also there be 6 month afetr you get the information in write before evacuation .
 rents be suppose to be freeze until feb 2010 . just find a new place . you will likely find good and cheap . leave your greed stricken landlord without a tenant . that will wake him up with no income come in .
 well the rent depend on the area where you want to live ... stay in doha city area be still expensive even you transfer to a new flat or villa . if you have car ; you can get a cheap room outside doha and just get-up earlier when go to work .

 assalalamu alaikkum ; along with the family visa application ; you need to attach copy of below document . i recently get my family 's visit visa transfer to resident visa . these be the document i submit . copies of below doc 1 . marriage certificate ( attested by qatar embassy in your country ) 2 . birth certificate of your child ( attested by qatar embassy in your country ) ( if you have child : ) ) 3 . passport copy of you and family . 4.your labor contract give by company . 5 . bank statement show 6 month salary credit ( salary should be more than qr.7000 per month ) 6 . letter from your company request visa for your family and your salary must be mention . 7 . house rental agreement ( contract ) 8 . copy of kahrama bill if you have all of above insha allah you must get family visa . i get it . however try your luck in case you do n't have some of above document .

 you just have to show the original uae license to traffic department ( graffa ) they will give you the qatar license . provide you have iqama ( rp ) ; other wise you will get temporary license with out any test . note : - you do not have to handover the uae license .
 one more info need ; pls tell me all the document require for this procedure at trffic department .
 if you be on visit visa : - 1 . n.o.c from the sponsor . 2. original passport . 3. fee qr 250/- note : license will be issue till your visit visa be valid . if you have iqama ( resident permit ) : - 1 . n.o.c letter from the company . 2 . original passport 3 . original i.d . card 4. fee qr 150/- note : - license will be issue for 5 year for both the licenses you need to go through eye test .

 embassy of canada to kuwait and qatar there have be a mutually-supportive pattern of political cooperation between canada and kuwait ; base largely on a commonality of view and interest . since it independence in 1961 ; kuwait have hold regular parliamentary election and canada be pleased to see female citizen receive the right to vote and run for election in 2005 . the embassy of canada offer a number of service to both canadians and other citizen . in addition ; the embassy cover the country of qatar so they can apply through hr embassy in kuwait ; ask them to call

 qpb office dafna ; doha contact # 4483 9557 1 . after rainbow roundabout ; go straight to qatar exhibition or known as qatar tourism authority . remember the exhibition must be on your right while driving . 2 . after qatar exhibition ; you have to drive straight passing the exhibition roundabout 3 . after exhibition roudabout ; go straight and make a u turn on the next roundabout or known as ( qatarat roundabout ) 4 . after u turn ; straight ahead and you are reaching the first cut of the road and make turn right . remember ; after turning right ; on your right must be the newton international school . 5 . after first cut turn right ; immediately turn right again and you will see the arrow embassy of azerbaijan ; going straight until reaching the dead end . after dead end ; turn left . 6 . after turning left ; count 4 villas on your left and you will finally reach our office ; no . 109 .

 recognitions/approval the sikkim manipal university ; gangtok be incorporate under the state legislative act ( act ix of 1995 ) of the government of sikkim . sikkim manipal university directorate of distance education be recognise by university grants commission ( ugc ) ministry of hrd member of association of indian universities ( aiu ) recognised by distance education council ( dec ) sikkim manipal university ; directorate of distance education offer program spread across 10 discipline . sikkim manipal university - directorate of distance education offer program in masters ; bachelors ; diploma and pg diploma level in various discipline like information technology ; management ; journalism and mass communication ; biotechnology ; bioinformatics ; apparel & fashion design ; allied health sciences ; hospitality ; telecom and commerce .
 sikkim manipal university does anybody know where be sikkim manipal university distance education center in qatar ? thanks in advance
 sikkim manipal university be a public-private partnership between the government of sikkim [ 1 ] and manipal education in india . it be establish in 1995 and be recognise by the university grants commission ( ugc ) . smu have two constituent institute : sikkim manipal institute of medical sciences ( smims ) and sikkim manipal institute of technology ( smit ) . apart from regular college-based program ; the university provide course in distant education through sikkim manipal university distance education ( smude ) . all the degree provide in distance mode be approve by distance education council ( dec ) . smu be a member of association of indian universities ( aiu ) and association of commonwealth universities ; uk ( acu from wikipedia

 as far a i know it 's no less than 21 day per year so it can be both but minimum be 21 day .
 21 day per year base on the basic salary
 article 54 of qatar labour law state that : in addition to any sum to which the worker be entitle to upon the expiry of his service ; the employer shall pay the end of service gratuity to the worker who have complete employment of one year or more . this gratuity shall be agree upon by the two party ; provide it be not less than a thre-week wage for every year of employment . the worker shall be entitle to gratuity for the fraction of the year i proportion to the duration of employment . tha last basic wage shall be the base for the calculation of the gratuity .

 hi ; for visiting visa their be no need of exit permit ; if you extend or not ; only rp person need to have exit permit

 if ur sibling come on a tourist visa he can not be look for a job . if he come on a visit visa after a month you may apply for an extension for another 5 month . if he be lucky to get a job by then he will require to transfer to company visa ( rp ) if not he will have to exit and come back only after 3 month .
 tourist visa can be change to family visit visa without exit the country . i get it do for my family just a month ago . charges be qar 500 per visa for transfer other than the normal visa charge .

 ya no need of membership in qatar bowling center to play but if i regularly go there i suggest you to apply for membership coz the will give you discount . for the membership it 150 annual fee and than you have to pay 10 riyal per game from 5pm to 12pm and 6 riyal from 9am to 5pm if u r not a member you have to pay 15 riyal after 5pm and 10 riyal before 5 pm ..

 http : //m.arabianbusiness.com/qatar-alcohol-ban-could-be-tip-of-iceberg-for-gcc-440454.html qatars move to ban the sale of alcohol on it flagship pearl development may hint at the start of a gulf-wide clampdown on booze sale a government look to pacify local fear ; analyst say . the gcc state may move to rein in sale and tighten alcohol legislation in a bid to walk the line between the expatriate population and their muslim citizen in the wake of the arab spring unrest ; say guy wilkinson ; manage partner at dubai hospitality consultancy ; viability . qatar be hardly the first gulf state in which the local population have express it concern over the sale of alcohol ; he tell arabian business . following the arab spring ; i expect muslim party to have more and more influence over the control of alcohol throughout the region . the sale of alcohol be strictly monitor in five of the gulf state with saudi arabia operate an outright ban on the sale and consumption of liquor . the move to offer alcohol license to outlet and non-muslims be largely a nod to the region expatriate worker ; who vastly outnumber the local population . but the decision have be meet with criticism from some citizen who oppose the sale of liquor in muslim country . qatar retain comparatively tight rule govern alcohol consumption ; say wilkinson . just a few year back ; one could only find it in just a few luxury hotel and club with strict entry procedure ; he say . the fact that it population have increase so fast over the last few year have evidently not change the concern of muslims over the potential ill effect of alcohol consumption ; particularly in term of moral behaviour . chiheb ben mahmoud ; head of hotel advisory ; for mena at jones lang lasalle ; say the open sale of alcohol be always a delicate balance for gulf government . sometimes ; local public opinion be heat up on the back of a combination of factor . it be common for authority in these case to act swiftly in order to defuse tension and prevent the issue from heat up far and get out of control ; he say . the suspension of sale on the pearl could be see a a wake-up call or a reminder of the invisible red line not to be cross .

 in addition ; it be also clear state by the labor law of qatar that once you be cancel ; the work visa be still on work condition but the company whom you have work for will give you re-entry visa for go back here and work with the same company otherwise automatic discharge of the work permt on the side of the company and no more excuse but you will get back after 2 yr .

 and also ; what be the min investment capital i need to start up a company in qatar ?
 hi aj ; i work for a british manage company that specialize in partner with company come to qatar . the most common form of business setup in qatar be a limited liability company . to incorporate that company you 'll require ; - share capital of a qrs200 ; 000 . - your qatari partner must have at least 51 % ownership . - the profit share of the partner do not have to match the shareholding of the partner . our company be in a position to act a your local partner . this be the basic ; if you 'd like to know more ; please feel free to pm me for more information . best regard ; james
 thanks for the info . i be just read online about the new law that come out ; it say that if your in the ict sector then you can actully own 100 % of the company be that true ? regards ;
 ok ; the answer to that be ; yes and no ! it 's true this 'law ' be announce about 18 month ago . as with many thing here ; in reality it 's not quite a straight forward a it would seem . yes ; theoretically an it company can be under 100 % foreign ownership ; however ; in practice it seem most of the company involve be large international company who have be 'invited ' to come to qatar by hrh . it 's an expensive route to take ; and frankly there 's little chance of approval . we would be happy to go down this road on your behalf and make the application ; though it wo n't be cheap with an extremely minimal chance of success ! any other info ; let me know .

 vist visa hi everyone ; my husband have recently move to doha . i be plan to go to doha as soon a possible . is it possible to go on a visit visa now and then convert it into a family visa ? if so please tell me the what be the procedure for the same and the cost for apply for visit visa and convert it into family visa . also please let me know if there be any website which provide these detail . thanks .
 qatarbrat ; dont be so quick . pallash ; first you may want to make sure that your husband be eligible to sponsor you ; i.e . he meet certain requirement set up by the qatari authority
 i be sure a an engineer your husband will be get the minimum salary requirement ( qr . 7000 ) for apply your visa .
 u need the following document to apply for ur visa . ur husband 's salary certificate . noc from ur husband 's employer . ur husband 's qid copy . ur and ur husband 's passport copy . attested ( indian foriegn affairs-delhi ) copy of ur marriage certificate . ( here also need attestation by indian embassy and expatriate affairs.-for attestation u need original marriage certificate here. ) if ur husband have all these document with him he can directly go to gharraffa emigration and submit the application.ur husband 's company 's pro also can do it . fees qrs.200/- then u will get family visit visa . ur entry visa 's validity up to 1 month . after ur entry in qatar u want to go to medical check up . then u can get 5 month more.fees qrs.200/- per month . u can stamp it in ur passport monthly or 5months together . then ur husband can apply a permanent visa for u in this period.it can start immediate after ur entry here or after five month . for permanent visa also u want to follow up the same procedure . ( like new application ) ur husband need minimum 7000/- riyal salary . ( minimum 3months bank statement must ) . electricity and water bill ( it should be in the name of ur husband . ) if ur husband 's company provide company 's accommodation to him give proof of it ; then no need for electricity bill . ur medical check up validity be for 6 month . if u will get permanent visa with in this period u do n't want to under go the medical check up again . goodluck if u need some more information regard this ; do n't hesitate to send a pm to me .
 family visit visa : hello ; ask ur husband to visit qatar immigration office along with belove these 1 ) wife pp copy 2 ) husband rp copy 3 ) husband pp copy 5 ) marriage certificate copy 6 ) salary statement ( must 7.500 qr ) if lessthan this they will ask you many question . once he have these all ; he can get application for apply visit visa for his spouse . once he fill the form and after the submission he will get the appointment through sms . during the inerview he may answere some question . once pass they will issue the visit visa . wife can stay with husband sponser ship up to 2 month without processing of rp . if she want to stay morthan 3 month she must go for medical test in order to rp process .

 hi ; as mention before ; panasonic ; beur ; omron ; braun etc be good machine ... u can get from any pharmacies..but try to get one that measure at the upper arm and not the wrist ; a the upper arm one be suppose to be more accurate ...
 your residence permit be expire . it mean you do not have any residence permit . the grace period be give to finalize your matter in qatar in case you do n't have enough time ; and to leave the country . grace period do n't mean you have a valid rp . and since you do not have an rp ; what the he 'll be you go to transfer ? you have to renew your rp with your current sponsor ; after that you can transfer your rp .

 soniyaji ; it be prevail traffic rule in qatar ; if it be slightly scratch or damage while reverse ; park etc . ; still it be well to go to traffic and show them ; get a clearance paper ; then go to insurance with their specify garage to get it repaired . there by you be safe at the time of istimara pass your car annually .
 with out a police report ; garage guy will not agree to repair ur car . u need to go to ploce station & should pay 112 riyal to get the letter .
 if a car damage ; no matter it be your own fault or by someone else 's ... a police report be a must in either case it 's a rule here .

 that tom cruise daughter name.. the los angeles times summarize the write statement cruise release on the birth a say the name `` be a word with origin in both hebrew and persian . in hebrew ; it mean 'princess ' and in persian ; 'red rise ; ' it be claim in the release . `` [ 19 ] however ; magazine and blog note on cruise 's mistranslation on suri 's hebrew meaning . [ 20 ] in hebrew ; suri actually mean `` from syria '' ; not `` princess '' . [ 21 ] [ 22 ] the wrong etymology might stem from the fact that suri be a yiddish pet form of sarah ; which mean `` princess '' . [ 23 ] curiously ; in japanese 'suri ' can mean `` pickpocket . `` [ 24 ] in korean ; 'suri ' be a conjugation of the verb 'to repair ' ( mechanical device ) .

 i always settle traffic violation during registration and never have problem leave country be frequent flyer ... how ?
 you will only have to pay the violation before travel if the fine be register to your qatar id . so for a speeding fine that a radar caught you do will be register to the vehicle and not your id in which case you will be fine . if you get stop at a roundabout for not wear a seatbelt and the police man ask for your license ; then the fine would regisetred against your id ; in which case you would have to pay the fine before travel .
 should traffic violation be settle before travel on vacation ? should traffic violation be settle before travel on vacation ?
 it be only mandatory if you resign and leave qatar for good ... but for frequent flyer not necessary .
 qatars department of traffic and patrol police have say motorist who have outstanding fine will not be allow to leave the country once a new law come into force this week ; report the peninsula . potential violator can access the ministry of interiors website from october 2 to check for any possible fine . meanwhile fine will increase at a rate of qr1 per day if they be not pay within 60 day . via : ameinfo

 a follow up question ... .is it possible to get again ur exit permit from your sponsor or still valid ? how many day do exit permit valid ?
 exit permit be valid for 1 week from issuance..
 there be two type of exit permit . the type good for one use ; which expire if not use and and unlimited exit permit which be good for one year . you should ask for the unlimited kind ; if your sponsor be amenable ; which will avoid the hassle of have to get one each time you leave the country ( there be also a fee charge for the unlimited type ) ; but do n't be surprised if your sponsor refuse . there be no penalty for fail to use either type of exit permit .

 qs ; along salwa road there be numerous tire shop . mostly they have a big sign for the brand they sell . here in qatar it be not neccessary to buy high speed rat tire ( hr ) type ; because the speed limit in this country be 120 km/h . i have an american car and i buy american tire ; `` cooper '' . if you have a japanese car ; buy japanese tire ( bridgestone ) ; if you have a european car buy dunlop or michelin .  < a href= '' http : //tinypic.com '' target= ''  '' > < img src= '' http : //i41.tinypic.com/oi56k2.jpg '' border= '' 0 '' alt= '' / '' > . . < b > dot manufacturer code or tire identification number . for example ; b9pa b55x 101 ; though usually prefix with dot ; and usually call the dot code or tin . this code ; assign by the department of transportation ; indicates who manufacture the tire ; where ; and when . . the date of manufacture be indicate by the last group of digit ; which usually appear in a sunken rectangle . . before 2000 ; this group have three digit ; since 2000 ; it have have four . . the first two digit be the week of the year ( 01 = the first week of january ) . . the third digit ( for tire make before 2000 ) be the year ( 1 = 1991 ) . . for tire make after 2000 ; the third and fourth digit be the year ( 04 = 2004 ) . . the date of manufacture be essential information because tire deteriorate even if they be not use . european automobile manufacturer recommend that tire old than 6 year ; include spare never drive upon ; be discarded. < /b > . . < a href= '' http : //tinypic.com '' target= ''  '' > < img src= '' http : //i39.tinypic.com/29658m.jpg '' border= '' 0 '' alt= '' image and vid

 `` to join the club ; please submit in person the sign application form and the rules and regulation form . these form can be download by follow the link below . you will also need to provide the following : 1 . a certificate of employment from your company outline your job title ; grade and salary . 2 . a photocopy of each family member passport . 3 . two passport photo of each member of the family . 4 . a sign credit application form if you intend to sign for bill while at the club . you will be inform once your application have be accept . on payment of your membership fee your membership card will be ready within 3 day . annual membership fees initiation fee qar 1 ; 000.00 husband & wife with up to 5 child under 18 year qar 11 ; 000.00 children between the age of 18 and 20 year register with family qar 3 ; 750.00 single lady and member male dependant from 21 to 25 qar 7 ; 500.00 additional child under 18 ( year ) qar 1 ; 000.00 n.b . membership fee be non-refundable and not transferable . membership be not transferable . membership fee be also subject to change . '' < b > contact info : dana club p.o box - 7995 doha ; qatar telephone : +974 496 0 600 fax : +974 496 0 633 email : info @ danaclub.com.qa < /b > ..there ; do i miss anything else ? click the link below for more info : http : //www.danaclub.com.qa/english/membership
 applying for an nso authenticate mc only take 1 week ; and if you apply for a visa ; will take you another week ; plus translation in the embassy will take you roughly 1 week . so ; what 's the rush ? ministry of interior will ask you to get the stamp from the embassy ; and in order for you to get that from our embassy ; it need to be from the nso . if you 're really in a hurry ; buy a business visa ; or book her in a hotel and get the 1 month tourist visa . if you want the 6 month family visit ; you need the proper document .
 if you need a 6 month family visa you need to undergo all those procedure . but if your wife will not stay more than 1 month here in doha you can go to hotel to apply for tourist visa . la villa palace hotel be issue a 1 month tourist visa for only 500 qr . you can call this no . to inquire 4367301 .
 if you really want a family visa ; you do n't have a choice but to do it by the book and get an nso authenticate mc . what 's the rush anyway.. it 's good to get the authenticated copy anyway because im sure you 'll need it for other purpose a well .
 only 1 month maximum ; you can get your nso authenticate certificate . just go directly to an nso office near you . and you may also need the dfa seal ( red ribbon seal ) . that make it more official .

 hello.. as far a i know you can transfer your sponsorship to both another company if you find one & to your husband if you think it expire soon ! as long a you have your noc ; no objection letter from the previous company ; nbi authenticate in the phils ; ( if you be filipino ) sorry i forget the other 's ... but yes you can transfer ! ! hope it help !
 transfer sponsorship be only need if you want to move to new company directly at the time you resign . in your case ; a long you have noc ; the new company will give you new sponsorhip ; new id ; rp ; no need 'transfer sponsorship ' letter anymore

 u go to one type centre.get a sponcership change form and u go to ur current sponcer get signature from him.u have to decide ur new sponcer .it can be ur husband or any other company those who have female visa or they have female employee on their sponcership.in the sponsership change form there be two colum/ current sponcer and new sponcer.u want to get signature from both.after that go to the emigration and make signature verification.then u can submit ur document to the emigration through ur mandoop . if u be change ur sponcership to ur husband ; he need minimum qrs.7000/-salary ( bank statement must ) u be now nine month in current sponcership ; so that u need some reccommendation ( vaasta ) also . good luck

 if they be on family visa the medical and application for the rp should be do within 30 day upon arrival in qatar .
 families of sponsored resident may enter qatar on a short-term family visit visa . the visa be valid for one month . however ; relative who wish to stay beyond one month may undergo a physical examination within the first 72 hour of arrival to apply for an extension . the visa can be extend to cover a maximum of six month only ( five extendable month for immediate family member and two month for second-degree relative ) . foreign employee who wish to bring their family to live in qatar should refer to the family visa . application process follow these step to apply for a family visit visa : * print and fill out form . * attach to the application a copy of the resident id or passport ; along with a copy of the applicant passport . * attach a letter from the resident employer outline his/her position and salary . * supply authenticate proof of relation ; such a marriage or birth certificate . * submit the application to the ministry of interiors immigration office . * pay appropriate fee . additional information a fee of qr200 applies for each visa ; and qr50 for each registered dependent or companion . the visa be valid for one month and can be extend for qr200 per month ( qr50 per month for the companion ) . additional document may be require for the visa application . ( information a per www.gov.qa ( hukoomi ) ) those who be in need of more information ; please log into www.gov.qa then click on `` services '' then click on `` visa ; passport and official documents '' then scroll down ; click on `` family visa - 3 services '' then click on `` family visa '' or family visit visa '' . you will get a full detail .
 * attach a letter from the resident employer outline his/her position and salary . * supply authenticate proof of relation ; such a marriage or birth certificate . * submit the application to the ministry of interiors immigration office . * pay appropriate fee . additional information a fee of qr200 applies for each visa ; and qr50 for each registered dependent or companion . the visa be valid for one month and can be extend for qr200 per month ( qr50 per month for the companion ) . additional document may be require for the visa application .
 those who need full and correct detail of family visa be request to log onto www.gov.qa . then click on `` services '' then `` visa ; passport and official documents '' then `` family visa - 3 services '' . you will get all the information regard your query .

 hello friend ; i do not think tourist visa be extendable beyond 1 month . because ; 6 month back i have arrange tourist visa for one of my relative to come to qatar through cleopatra travels . at the time of apply visa itself ; pro of travel agent have warn that it be strictly unextendable . the simple logic be if there be any chance for renewal ; the process must start from sponsor i.e . travel agent and defnitely not by u . anyway ; you may enquire at immigration at garaffa . so my advice be well not to take any risk or chance of overstay since the penalty be hefty . good luck .

 dear vinith ; the travel agency that we take the tourist visit visa tell u that tourist visa can not be extend beyond 30 day of stay . they offer u to make an exit to bahrain and go back to doha for a new 30-day tourist visa . however ; we opt that to transfer his tourist visa to business visa to the company that hire him and without go out of the country . it will be easy for him to transfer from business visa to rp because his sponsor be his company .

 energy drink be often mixed with alcohol . where energy drink be stimulant ; alcohol be a depressant . the mix can be particularly hazardous a energy drink can mask the influence of alcohol and a person can fail to take it effect into consideration . [ 21 ] normally fatigue would set in as large amount of alcohol be be consume ; but the stimulating effect of energy drink can override this effect . [ 22 ] often drink with vodka or in shot it have lead to increase in the purchase of pre-mixed drink also know a alco-pops often contain guarana or taurine extract which provide energy drink with their flavour . avoid give them ; make them to drink fruit juice .

 gatorade for kid ? my kid ( 2 yr and 9 yr ) love to drink gatorade ; i know gatorade be an energy drink ( for rehydration ) mostly for athlete ... its be safe for their age. ? ?
 what i give you now be not a wikepedia cut & paste . most of the energy drink consist of stimulants ; some of which be use a `` dope '' by the athlete . initially the drink may give you sudden outburst of energy ; but study show that such stimulant weaken the nervous system in the long run .
 gatorade do not have alcohol and be not consider an `` energy '' drink such a red bull . gatorade help to replenish electrolyte and carbohydrate that be lose when participate in physical activity . it be also a good drink to have when you have be ill to your stomach .

 money order can be obtain in post office . try visit one and inquire .
 depends on where u want to send money ; most exchange will give a certified cheque drawn on a bank in the receiving country a low rate ; most indians seem to send their money this way ; cost only a few riyal rather than the 30 riyal my exchange charge or the much high western union rate . i have use it to issue cheque in the uk and the eurozone much cheap than a telegraphic transfer but u have the postal delay and have to wait for the cheque to clear . go to a good exchange ; they may have an account the country ure interested in . above all do n't send your money thru the bank a their rate be high . try the post office as well and make ur choice good luck

 if you have icici bank account in india from any of your family member ; then you can send it through gulf exchange near al fardan . gulf exchange will charge you qar.15/- transaction and it will get credit in 12 working hour ; mean if you deposit in morning ; icici account in india will be get credit by even and also they pay a good exchange rate compare to other exchange in doha . the only you need for this be icici bank account number ; name of the account holder ; branch ; and amount . this service be know a instant transfer ; you can check or ask about icici transfer on indian counter available in gulf exchange . i prefer this be the safe way compare to western union ; amount ger directly credit in indian bank account also high rupee value compare to western union .
