 shelf life : http : //www.foodprocessing-technology.com/glossary/shelf-life.html about tire shelf life : http : //www.msnbc.msn.com/id/3088188 http : //www.advrider.com/forums/showthread.php ? t=459895 one say he have over 5 year old tire mount and they be perfect for a few year ... it be not the km you drive it be how you drive and they be work out it be also not the year ... again it be how you drive and they be wear out . but before you mount them they have to be save.. i try to google and no one have a 100 % correct answer to this q.. but at the end they have to be save so just dont by old tire ; it be your safety buy fresh new and crispy not spoil tire and be save .
 mrst2009 thanks for the joke early in the morning . shelf life for tire be 2 year ; 60 ; 000km or 3 year be after you mount them .
 from the web ... should tire be assign a shelf life ; like grocery ; milk or egg ? a safety research group say age tire develop crack or weaken when they sit around unused . tire maker in britain have just issue a warning to consumer . replace tire that be more than ten year old ; even if the tread not wear . and for a tire that hasnt be use ; like a spare ; replace it after six year . reviewing u.s. lawsuit ; the research group say that many accident involve old tire . according to strategic safety expert sean kane ; weve be able to document in a very short period of time at least 20 case involve serious injury and fatality in the united states ; and weve only scratch the surface of this issue here . ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! but read this one : shelf life not the answer but the u.s. tire industry say a shelf life be not the answer . donald shea of the rubber manufacturers association say : what it be be a complex series of event that can make a tire deteriorate . one ; be the amount of mileage ; two be the abuse it take on the road ; third and perhaps most important be the maintenance that be give or not give to the tire . if the public get the impression that they could continue to use a tire until that use by date that could send clearly the wrong message . when the nhtsa propose an upgrade to new tire standard it also propose an age standard . that be defer for two year because no one could agree on a reliable test that could artificially age a tire . the nhtsa be in the process of determine which test be best and hope to have research do by next summer . < ! -- break -- >
 you can check manufacture date from the stamp on the side of tire . stamp show the week and the year tire be manufacture . look for 4 digit number inside rounded rectangle . for example ; if you see 4007 it mean tire be manufacture on the 40th week of 2007 . similarly if it show 1208 it be manufacture on the 12th week ( early march ) of 2008 .

 over and no ! wow this question keep pop up constantly . the simple truth be leave your stuff there a you be not move here permanently ! the money and time you spend ship item here and back will be the price of the item . do n't waste your time and do n't be so attached to inanimate object . prices here be reasonable enough that you can get a tv and electronics for almost the same a at home . washers and dryer be actually cheap - almost half the cost . believe it or not quality mattress be half the price as well - show you how much you be gouge in the us . furniture be cheap and will last the time you live here . it 's disposable furniture ; replace every 5 year ... count on spend 10 percent of the first year 's salary on air cleaner ; dryer ; dishwasher if not supply and you 'll be fine . you can sell everything for half price to co-worker or on qatar living classified area and you 'll be ahead of the game . buy your furniture here at homes r us and electronics at carrefour ; giant store or lulu and you 'll be comfortable . it will cost you money to ship or to buy so just buy . simple a that .

 what be leave of the british empire in qatar ? i see the remnant of the ottoman empire in some of the remain fort ; but what about the british empire ? any sit or influence on qatar and qatari culture today that you see ?
 are you kid ? this place still is still part of the anglo empire ( now be run by the americans rather than the brits but still anglo ) . favorite sport : english football/soccer . huge effort to get the wc 2022 here . language : more people speak english than arabic in qatar . primary/secondary education : british curriculum ( or version of it ) prevail and be most sought universities : colony of american university economy : petroleum product extract by mostly american company ; distribute by mostly american company and use to fuel anglo empire and other economy . professional class : lot of brits and other anglos manage everything from bank to education to infrastructure shopping : mall be american look-a-likes pack with shop that be all over anglo world . whole concept of mass shopping like this indoors be american . health : people get obese just like in other part of the anglo empire a they feast on burger ; chicken nugget ; fry and coke . defense : mostly-american make weapon and a big us military presence politics : considered a close ally of britain ; us and other part of the anglo empire . cars : the favorite land cruiser be make in toyota 's american factory . dress : blue jean ( american ) and business suit ( english ) prevail . a gap in every mall . i be not say this be good or bad . it simply be ; and personally have no problem with it .
 ok i might be wrong ; but be it not the british who endorse the current ruling family in qatar ?
 britain be not a big influence when it be a protectorate ; but a olympics write ; a much large influence afterwards and indirectly ( via other part of the old empire ) . i suppose it all depend on how you interpret empire .
 the three pin electrical socket be british and most of the standard use him from finance to construction be british standards .

 there be several consideration in buy laptop and here be some of the basics.. looks - definitely you want to have a laptop which can be mistakenly recognize a an old one ; so you have to select which be the most updated and stylish in term of appearance . right now ; most laptop be get thinner compare to their predecessor . also ; a laptop which be small in term of screen width ( 14 inch below ) be so stylish and more handy . any brand of laptop can be as stylish a be seem depend on your taste . battery life - this be also a major consideration in buy laptop . it also create a lot of inconvenience if your laptop battery last for short period only . in my experience hp laptop battery be far well from any brand . just always remember that when you be charge your battery ; unplug the cable once it be fully charge . if you be go to use your laptop for a long period of time ; it 's good if you plug the laptop to a regulated power supply and detach your battery from the laptop . the first two be basic consideration . below point be dependent on your application the laptop shall be subject once it be in operation . applications be graphic design ; web-designs ; software ; chat ; game ; audio and video ; email and web-browsing ; etc . processor - buy laptop with a minimum of 2.0 ghz speed for good output of your application . graphics - if you want good graphic ; select a laptop with g-force in it . operating system - vista and it predecessor ; xp be really far from each other . although all new laptop be basically equip with vista os ; try on have two os 's like xp on one drive and vista on the other ( dualboot ) ; so you can be more flexible . ram and hdd - random access memory ( ram ) and hard disk drive ( hdd ) be also to be consider if you want high application . anyway laptops right now be arrive at 2gb ram and 250 hdd at minimum . hope i 'd help you on select a laptop . basically ; we can not really say what laptop be the best ; it depend on your preferred application usage .

 hi friend ; you can comeback qatar after 2 year ;

 1- apply for a job online for any company of your interest that be base in qatar . attend a telephonic interview . once you get through ; your employer will arrange your work permit . 2- look for a local manpower consultancy and find out if they have any opening in qatar . apply and attend the interview by the visit company representative . once select ; depend on the company ; you will be offer a month salary in advance with an air ticket to fly in to qatar . work permit will be arrange after you land up in doha . 3- visit qatar on a visit visa ; use your contact if any ; advertise in local daily or apply to situation vacant advert ; attend interview . on selection your visit will be convert to work permit . good luck

 is it legal in qatar for a company to hold an employee passport ? is it legal in qatar for a company to hold an employee passport ? it be buy to my attention that a company be in control of employee passport . i do not know the law regard this but it do not sound a if it be fair to me . does anyone know if this be allow ?
 it be illegal but normal in qatar !
 it doesnt make a difference since you can not leave the country without an exit permit
 it might seem illegal but the passport do n't serve it purpose even if it 's in your hand . should you need to exit or leave the country ; your company still need it in order to arrange for an exit permit . also ; it 's good to let your company have it for safekeeping . there have be lot of story or even appeal in the daily paper of people who have lose their passport while it be in their possession . in our company ; passport be store in a fire-proof safe . the staff have the option of either keep the passport with them or let the company keep it . majority prefer to keep it at the company 's safe ; it also guarantee that the residence permits be renew on time ; a it be a common practice that it be renew a week before it expiry .

 ca n't say with authority but i would guess that it be best to open an account with a bank that have a presence in your own home town .
 to open an account you need salary certificate and iqama copy with id copy or passport copy . open an account with qiib or qib ; if you take personnal loan or car loan.. there interest rate be very low compare to other bank . if you be look for good service then go for qnb .
 i believe qnb have the best banking service ; but perhaps not the most suitable interest rate or offer . you call any bank for require docuemtns to open an account .
 any bank will do
 it be well to open the account with those bank which have your company account . else ; you will be charge for transfer salary on a monthly basis . ie ; suppose your company be hold an account with doha bank and you have open an account with ahli bank ; you will be charge qr.25 for salary transfer every month . the document need be your passport copies & your id copy
 i use both doha bank and mashreq bank ... doha bank be quite good in service when you want to remit your money to your home land..

 1 . learn the road sign . no overtaking ; no parking or stopping and street marking . if do n't know them now ; there be a large sign on the wall so study there . 2 . you must know how to drive up the hill ; apply park break ; release ( without let the car roll back ) and drive ahead ; back down and turn . 3 . parking test - when you drive in to the space ; stay close to the right side of the parking space . reason be you will need to back out of the space and this will give you more room on the left side for turn a you back out . 4 . driving test tip ... . seat belt ; em brake ; signal use with nice skill on the road .

 if you 're in the market for a big screen television like 50 50-inches and above -- then i 'd suggest plasma a a safe bet . plasmas give you more bang for your buck at the big end of town ; and while lcds can give you good resolution ; plasma still have the edge in term of picture quality . one other thing to look for ; whether you opt for plasma or lcd ; be an integrated tuner -- many tvs still have analogue tuner ; which look pretty terrible on a large screen . try to get a model with an inbuilt hd tuner if you can . at the small end of thing ( 15 '' to 42 '' tvs ) ; lcd be the only way to go if you want something slim and tasteful .

 will pregnancy affect employment offer my friend 's wife will receive a job offer from a government office in another 4 -5 days.today they come to know that the lady be 1 month pregnant.will this affect her employment offer and what about the medical prior to join job too .
 speaking a a pregnant woman ; sometimes we can be idiots . around the third trimester you 'd forget your own head if it be n't attach to you .
 i think it not a problem ; but she will not be elgible for meternity leave before one yr ...
 normally pregnancy be not look a a hindrance . esp in the govt sector here in doha . but good to mention orally before the test go through . honesty never fail !
 looking at it from an hr point of view ; she 's not a good investment . first of all she 'll have to take quite a bit of time off in her first 9 month ( for doctor appts . sick leave ; etc ) as well a 54 day of maternity leave ; and the likely hood of her come back to work be slim . i would n't hire her .
 as per experience ; yes it will surely affect her job offer . i be one of the recruitment officer in one of the govt office before ; and it one of the policy that they ca n't hire a pregnant woman even in some govt & private office that i 've know . their reason : 1st ; they will think that you will be go to file your long day leave upon delivery or often to file a leave during pregnancy . 2nd ; they will probably think that you can not exert ur best effort in do your job because usually pregnant woman feel so many body change ; body pain etc ; and sometimes some superior be hesitant to give work load to their staff if she be pregnant . 3rd : ur medical result will be stamp a unfit to work if find out that your pregnant ... so the best thing ; if your planning to look for work ; dont get pregnant ; but you can get pregnant if you already hire or start to work ( bec . that 's 2 different case ) ...
 even with the smiley face that be harsh prism : -p ; not true for many many pregnant woman ; but mm be right too . anyway ; even while be pregnant and hormonally on a roller coaster ; pregnant woman can be extremely active and bring good result on the work front . coming to the op ; if the medical be already over ; then nothing really to worry about ; except probation may go longer ; once they know the employee be pregnant . if medical be not complete yet ; and if the candidate be really require by the company ; then a temporary job offer may be present to her ; and only when she return back from her maternity leave ; will her job become permanent . it all depend upon their hr policy .
 agree with arlene advise ; it all country rule not to hire pregnant unless nobody qualify for the post in the country or the applicant be a scientest .
 i wish her all the best ;
 han19 ... i didnt mean to be harsh ... just state reality from a corporates pov ... for idiot i think there be no issue ... for pregnant woman come on board afresh ; other woman have already elaborate on it ... .and smiley be just to soften the pinch of reality ... : ) but still if it sound harsh my apology to whomever it may concern ; a it be unintentional .
 if she receive a job offer letter and later get turn away ; then she may file a claim for discrimination . i do n't know if that can go anywhere in this legal system . but if she get hire ; her employer will have the right of put her under unpaid leave ; during the 50-day maternity leave period . for more detail ; read art . 96 of the labour law ( see below ) `` a female worker who have be employ by an employer for a complete year shall be entitle to maternity leave with full pay for a period of fifty day . such maternity leave shall include the period before and after the delivery provide that the period follow the delivery shall not be less than thirty five day . ''

 i dont think it be a single step process . your new apartment will have a meter and a number give by kahrmaa . you will need to have that no when u go to kahrmaa and also the receipt which be give to you when you pay the adv for the current house . you will ofcourse have to fill out the transfer form and they will make the transfer . but you need to let them know when you be shift so that they can give you the connection before you shift . i guess thats about it . it all i do when i shift but that be in 2006. i doubt if much have change but here you never know . also have copy of your rp ; passport and id and a fotograph just in case and a copy of your new lease agreement .
 find kahrama office service depend on you area .. you need to cancel the first contract and the initiate new one .. not two bird in one shot .. cancellation procedure : 1- take photo of the meter reading of electrisity and water both .. 2-fill up the form of cancellation 3- copy of your identity card 4-copy of your tenancy contract 5-copy of gurantee slip ( 2000 ) qr then they will calculate your balance and issue check qnb or you have to pay in case your previous payment exceed the limit of 2000 qr advance ; next step initiate new account ... same procedure when you apply first time ... goodluck : ) )

 dear ; first decide very well what name you shall give ? after birth take father and mother passprot copy and marriage certificate . if bear in hamad hospital it be quiet easy . if not ( doha/ al ahalia clinic then get birth notification from the hospital ) and go to the birth registration office ( next to lulu center ; opp hamad clinic ) and produce the letter in ground floor reception along with marriage certificate ; parent passport and rp copy . by the time you can also get child vacination card . after that they will ask you to go to third floor . the will ask father and mother rp and qualification certificate . give it in 3rd floor and pay in ground floor . accord to number of copy you will pay . after a week you can collect it.later take it to embassy and get birth certificate from them and apply for passport . after get passport you can also apply and get rp .

 the hospital will advise you for birth certificate ; take 2-4 additional copy of birth certificate ; it will be available for additional payment of qr . 20/- for each . approach your embassy for make passport for your expect baby . apply for residence permit original passport one photograph of your baby original birth certificate copy of blood group certificate father & mother rp copy . pls . make sure you have to apply within two month ; after birth ; for the residence permit ; otherwise there will be a fine of qr . 10/- per day of delay .

 learn arabic for lady : ( i just copy past the information ) mariam center date of registration : mon 14th june from 8-10am . placement test will start at 8.15am . please allow at least one hour to complete the registration process . course date : october 2010 to may 2011 . registration fee : non refundable fee of qr200 for the whole year to cover book and other material . time of arabic classes : students be require to attend class twice a week on mon and wed morning ; for 2 hour each . please note that our morning schedule start at 8am and the last class of the morning finish at 12.15pm . places be limit and will be offer on a first come basis . a student 's suitability for the course will also be take into account when allocate place . if you have any further question ; please do not hesitate to contact the centre on tel 450 5301 or mob 529 1785 .

 muslim marriages be perform at the sharia court ; which be locate on al rayyan road near mannai ra in the musheirib area . you must provide two witness for the marriage . please note that the sharia court will only marry two muslim . even though marriage between muslim men and christian woman be perform by sharia court in other muslim country ; they be not perform in qatar . but they need the paper from health center ( pre marital examination ) i take mine in al rayyan health center . have an appointment before go there . you will get the result after 2 week . and since i dont ahve nokah here and my father pass away they ask for a certificate that he pass away and a certificate that i didnt get marry before .

 yes you will have to pay your monthly utility ( w/e ) bill a they give you electricity allowance ... it 's in your contract.. you sign it and there 's nothing you can do about it but to abide with it ...
 as you have sign the house agreement without w/e and a your company have agree for electricity allowance ; good discus and clear the matter with your company . that 's the only solution .
 it depend . as per your agreement you will be the one pay the utility bill a you be get an allowance . there be many companies in qatar who be pay the utility bill but they be not give such allowance to their employee .
 water and electric bill be provide in your accomodation . your company will be the resposible to pay it . company can not rent an accomodation if the water and electricity bill be not include in their contract with the owner of the house . if water and electric bill be not include in your accomodation ; that mean you be not provide with accomodation . that mean you be leave out which be the company be give you housing allowance and it 's up to you look for an accomodation whether share or independent ...
 visa for new born can someone tell me the process on how to get visa for my new bear baby ?
 1 . passport copy of your and your wife . 2 . rp or id copy of the parent . 3 . birth certificate of a baby.. 4 . marriage certificate attest copy . 5 . housing contract copy/ elec.water bill copy . ( keep these for a safe side ) . 6 . passport copy of your baby . 7 . approach immigration at airport or gharaffa immigration . kindly wait for other qlers to reply you if i 've miss out any points..thanks

 u should understand the difference between withhold and actual tax . as per the law which come in effect on 1/1/2010 ; for those company that be do work in the country without be register / do n't have cr/ the owner of the contract will withhold either 5 % or 7 % ( depend on the activity ) of the total payment on monthly basis . this amount will be pay to the tax authority before the 15th of the follow month . in my opinion ; this be to encourage foreign company to establish a base office in the country .

 there be no specific provision on the labor law which state your claim unless there be an agreement between you and your company . the end of service gratuity be 3 week pay for every year of service . article ( 54 ) in addition to any sum to which the worker be entitle to upon the expiry of his service ; the employer shall pay the end of service gratuity to the worker who have complete employment of one year or more . this gratuity shall be agree upon by the two party ; provide that it be not less than a three-week wage for every year of employment . the worker shall be entitle to gratuity for the fraction of the year in proportion to the duration of employment . the worker 's service shall be consider continuous if it be terminate in case other than those stipulate in article ( 61 ) of this law and be return to service within two month of it termination . the last basic wage shall be the base for the calculation of the gratuity . the employer be entitle to deduct from the service gratuity the amount due to him by the worker .

 hello smoke ; firmware 05.14.02 ; can not be unlock for other carrier ; once phone upgrade to os4.1 it firmware automatically change to 05.14.02 . there be no way you can down grade to previous firmware . phone with os4.1 can be jailbroken with limera1n ; carriee unlock be not possible a of now . dev team be work on it but no solution a yet .
 u of mich ... what be you say i cant go back to my previous ios ? ? ? ? i 'm sure there be a way out of this ; just want to go back to my previous 4.0.1 thats it . there 's nothing great with the 4.1 release anyways : p whats this about upgrade the baseband ? wtf be that ?
 yes you can downgrade to os4.0.1 ; but firmware that be 05.14.02 no . operatiing system ( os ) and firmwars ( baseband ) be two different thing . you can play around with os but once firmware ( baseband ) upgrade to 05.14.02 ; it can not be change a of now . i be sorry but that be correct you can not use your phone until there be a new tool become available on internet .
 well this be what i find on the net : how to downgrade ios 4.1 ( baseband 05.14.2 ) to ios 4.0 ( baseband 05.13.4 ) using fuzzyband 1 . launch cydia from your springboard ; and go to system under section tab 2 . press to select 3g fuzzyband downgrader from the list of package & click on install . 3 . after installation be complete successfully return to cydia and press home button and launch fuzzyband . 4 . a message will be display if your bootloader be not support ; if you have the 5.08 bootloader you will be able to downgrade from baseband 05.12.01 . press the downgrade button to begin downgrade your baseband . 5 . once the downgrade have complete successfully you will be display a done ! message say ; i haz downgrade ! now if i downgrade it to 5.12.01 will my phone work with qtel ?

 je vois que ce n'est pa necessaire de visiter paris si vous ne parler le francais .
 paris favorites : eating ; drinking and shoopping.no ; sure not that all limit when the place be paris.do not by pas visiting muse de la mode ( 10 ; avenue pierre ier de serbie ) the museum be a treasure trove of fashion from the 18th - 20th century ; it would be a great off the beaten path stop for a trip to paris and some other tip for you ; tip # 1 for paris - if you be in paris drive a car ; be aware that people in paris drive however they want to . tip # 2 - if you have a car ; get a good tourist book which will tell you where and where not to park . tip # 3 - learn a bit of french . a great book which have a lot of basic phrase and fun thing to try be rick steves ' handy pocketbook guide to basic french ( find book ) tip # 4 - use the metro ( the subway ) . there be simply no good way to get around paris . but make sure you 've brush up on your french . it will help with buy ticket and understand the map in the subway . tip # 5 - the line and crowd at the eiffel tower can get very long . if you must see the light of paris at night ( and you should ) go on a week night ( not friday ) ; or make reservation . tip # 6 - the louvre . from what i understand ; if you be an art lover and really appreciate art museum ; you could spend week there ; but for most people ; half a day be enough time . you see the famous picture ( mona lisa ) ; and spend some time look at the amazing art . if you go on sunday morning and get there a they 're open ; it 's free admission . tip # 7 - if there be one place that be absolutely crazy to drive in paris ; it 's in the roundabout that go around the arc d'triomphe . if you rent a car and drive here ; just go travel around in your car like you would if there be no rule . tip # 8 - there be lot of wonderful museum in france ! one of them be the pantheon ; which be originally a church ; and originally plan to be something other than that .victor hugo and some other famous french people be bury there . make sure you set aside some time and some money to visit the museum if that 's something you want to do . tip # 9 - have some small change ( or large change if you can afford it ) on hand for the street performer . they 're pretty good ! tip # 10 - if you like look at the inside of church ; take some time for notre ' dame ; and if you have a problem with crowd ; do n't go on the weekend . people be pretty respectful inside the cathedral on the weekday ; but there be a lot of people there on the weekend ; so you end up wait in line ; and it get more noisy inside . tip # 11 - if you want to see the eiffel tower light up and sparkle at night ; get there right before the hour . tip # 12 - if you see a person on the street who be sell something and want to sketch you or give you something for free ; do n't be fool by talk which say they 'll so something for free . it is n't free !  < b > attitudes be more important than fact ... < /b >

 1 . select a car of ur choice . 2 . take it to computer check . 3 . once u r satisfy with the test ; negotiate the price . 4 . go to muroor with the letter from ur sponsor ; id card ; qr250 and the owner of the car ; to transfer it to ur name . take an atm or credit card a they do n't accept cash . muroor have type centre ; where u will type the form in arabic ; with ur detail and car .
 we too have a secondhand car..first thing we do be ; request an noc from our sponsor since this be need when we have the process of car transfer ; photocopy of id 's ... just make sure the car you be buy be in very good condition and the insurance or istimara be valid for another ( 3-6 mo ) ; 1 year be well . that way you have ample time to have it check or no more cash be go out of your pocket for repair . one more thing..check if the car have any traffic violation before the transfer that way the first owner will pay it..on our case we just find out day after that the car have violation on the same day we get the car ... too bad for u ( we try to request for photo ) to check if it 's really our car but the police ca n't present any proof cause it 's a parking violation and it 's the mobile police who note it . we pay it & we do n't want to argue anymore..just have it on the wrong time ; the violation be make in a place we never visit and the owner of the car already leave the country . anyway goodluck on your new car .

 if it a 2nd hand car your talk about ; then do not go to the bank . go to finance company ; like jazeera finance or first finance . they have much good rate & the model of the car do n't matter .
 thanks for info i be the seller and i just want to know when i will get my payment ; what be payment process ?
 your car be thru car loan and you want to sell it ? the buyer must pay first ; then you go to the bank to pay the car loan amount ( full ) ; ask for the clearance from the bank for the full payment of the car loan . ( 2days ) once you have the clearance ; you can proceed to traffic dept . for the transfer of ownership ( seller and buyer ) .
 use car loan do anybody know process of used car loan ? banks be pay directly to dealer ? if yes ; where be the guarantee for seller ? be dealer pay to seller after transfer the registeration of car to buyer ? i be plan to sell my car but confuse about the process
 if you have a buyer already and he/she want to pay your car from a bank loan ? he should first go to a car dealer ; he will get a quotation from them ( qr1000 fee ) ; take it to the bank . bank will give him the money ; he then pay you . after receive the payment you can give him you car.of course he will do all the transfer of ownership procedure .
 thanks for useful info ; the buyer want to buy my car via car loan ( commercial bank ) ; and the bank ask from buyer to bring the quotation from dealer which we provide already now ; that be ok but bank be tell that they will make the payment to dealer directly and than i will get my money from dealer ; be it correct ? i dont understand this part in case dealer do not want to pay it to me ; where be my guarantee ?
 if you look at the reverse ( back ) of your car registration card ; at the right hand bottom you will see a column 'type of ownership ' in arabic nough almukia . if you have your bank name write there ; you can not sale this car without a no objection letter from the bank .
 yes ; you can sell your car . you have to take the buyer of your car to the bank and settle all your remain amount in the bank plus pay you if the total price of the car beyond or high than the remain amount in the bank . after that process do ; the bank will give out noc to you for you to hand over the noc to the new buyer for him to process with the traffic police department to change the ownership . you have to go along with the new buyer to the insurance company to change the ownership before proceed to the traffic police department for change the ownership and renewal of the registration card . cheers..
 dann be correct . you can either go to the registration dept first if the buyer feel un-secure and then go to the insurance company second . but first you must go to the bank along with you buyer to clear the outstanding amount before proceeding . if buyer have an account in the same bank ; then bullseye ! your task be much easy .

 from thur or sunday depends
 depends on the management ; generally and a per labour law it be three work day start from the first day of eid ; management of each company can extend it a per their policy
 according to my secret agent it 's friday ; saturday ; and sunday . make sure your company give you sunday off !
 plus the 26th and 27th - so it 's 5days holidays !
 as per labour law it be 3 work day and if you be not work normally on saturdays then it will be possibly from friday to tuesday . if you be normally work on saturdays it will be from friday to monday . some companies follow the labour law but there be a lot of private companies give only one or two day .

 all the major car company chrage the same here unless you have gcc coverage
 i import prado from dubai an year ago and toyota dealer ask the same . i be take the vehicle to tayseer service station and they be excellent . you can actually monitor what technician be do . make sure that he follow the maintenance schedule . even if you flush the engine ; change japan make oil filter and use mobile 10 ; 000 km oil it will not cost more than 300 qr where a in toyota ; the same with 5000 km oil will cost around qr 800 1000 . go to salwa road tayseer and get the vehicle service in less than 2 hr . in toyota dealer it will take not less than one entire day .
 just notice you say your car be one year old . for sure it be under warranty so check with toyota dubai to see if your warranty be valid at any toyota dealer which it should be . it be possible that the story i relay to you be in fact i believe either toyota or bmw . if your warranty be valid i would definitely go to the proper authority at the ministry of economy and commerce and report the toyota dealer . make them service your vehicle under the condition of the warranty you agree to . believe me they know what they be do and they know it be wrong but yet they still try to bend the condition to their liking . make them honor the rule they have the responsibility to uphold . i be sure for every car they have to service from outside qatar there be one that leave they dont have to .

 another thing learnt . question : why be there salt in the ocean ?
 there be so many why question include this one : )
 it be estimate that the ocean form about 500 million year ago . a lot of the salt enter the ocean during their formative year . as igneous rock cool below the ocean ; they release a lot of the salt into the ocean . more salt enter the ocean a rock and sediment on the ocean floor dissolve . still more salt enter the ocean through the erosion of the land . as mountain gradually break down and rain wash over the land ; naturally occur salt of the earth be wash into the ocean . as water from the ocean evaporate ; the salt be leave behind ; so the ocean get more salty with time . http : //www.strangequestions.com/question/709/why-is-there-salt-in-the-ocean.html

 hey buddy have to do this myself a month back and here 's what i learn : 1 ) first up ; you can normally only sponsor your immediate family or blood relative on a visit to qatar . what that mean be you cant sponsor your friend since he be not relate to you . i have hear of some people with special work visa who be able to do so but im guessing you be n't one of them 2 ) now the only option you have be to get a visa through a hotel for your friend..within this option you have two more option ; you can get a one month tourist visa for a thousand rial but he will have to stay in the hotel which will be expensive..your second and more feasible option be a business visa through the hotel..this will however cost you 2000 rial ; be valid for three month but the friend can stay with you instead of the hotel..there 's a few hotel that do this and you could try gulf horizon behind standard charter bank near the souq waqif/souq asiri area near the corniche . 3 ) now depend on the budget ; if your friend be visit for long ; then the business visa will be expensive but save the expense and hassle of stay in the hotel . but if it 's a short visit then you could inquire about the hotel 's rate for his stay.. so yeah ; i manage to get my buddy into doha because he be ready to pay 2000 for a business visa..hope you and your buddy can get together and have a great time too..best of luck buddy : - )

 nothing to worry about find your choice of accommodation suitable for your budget in qatar ; or scar to secure one with key-money a in your uae . just step in to cooperative store or big hyper market ; nowadays 100 of advertisement be there look for people to share it ; or rent independantely the apartment for reasonable rate . so you try to keep move into the cooperative store from location to location so most of the advertisement be find stick on their wall ; with contact no . and you can manage to get one without any difficulty approx . not morethan 4000/- a best one .

 flying with your pet faqair travel for animal can be tricky and dangerous business ; so it be important to know what the law ; the airline ; and veterinarian recommend . questionshow do i know if air travel be appropriate for my pet ? what step should i take prior to a flight to make sure my pet 's trip go smoothly and safely ? can my pet travel in the cabin of the airplane ; rather than in the cargo hold ? what do the law require me to do if my pet be go to travel in the plane 's cargo hold ? answerhow do i know if air travel be appropriate for my pet ? not all pet can or should travel by plane . air travel be stressful for pet ; so you should consider a number of factor before decide to transport your pet on an airplane ; include your pet 's disposition ; age ; breed and health . heat or pregnancy . animals who be in heat or who be pregnant should not travel by plane . age . federal law require that animal be at least eight week old and fully wean ( mean wean for at least five day ) before they travel in the cargo hold of a plane . although the law do not say so ; veterinarian generally recommend against put elderly pet through the discomfort of air travel . breed . pug-nosed animal should never travel in the cargo hold of a plane . this be because of the structure of their face ; which may inhibit their breathing during air travel . if your dog be of one of the breed list below ; be sure to discuss the issue with your veterinarian and with the airline . many airline will not accept pug-nosed animal for air travel . the following dog be consider to be pug-nosed : american staffordshireenglish toy spanieldutch pugshih tzustaffordshire bull terrierbrussels griffinpekineseboston terrierenglish bulldogjapanese pug ; andjapanese spaniel .

 - symetry be a sine qua non quality to be beautifull/harmonious . - color ( white teeth ; red lip ; eye ; one-color hair ... ) - cleanliness ( hair well do ; skin ; teeth ... ) - smell - sound ( voice ) - size/ratios ( chest-waist-hips ) - form ( long neck ; face shape ; hair ; dress.. )
 the standard of beauty be not definite ; you define it . it be how you carry yourself in the face of all the people ; situation surround you . for you ; how do you define beauty ? everyone here have a word to say about beauty and if that be there personal view about the topic than so be it ... .^^
 beauty be a very big word that most people do not understand and easily mis-interprete most time . have you ever wonder why some find tall lady pretty and others think petite lady make the world go round ? and why do some like light skin tone and others will go anywhere around the world just to have a darker skin tone ? ? or why do some people simply just get bore of the beauty queen the marry recently ? it because ; beauty is a combination of desirable physical ; moral and intellectual qualities . physical beauty be a combination of quality like shape of body ; color ( light or dark tone of skin ; hair ; eye not necesarily ethnic background ) and form so that it cause a pleasing effect on the beholder sens . the right mix of this differs from person to person . its good know a pretty in female and handsome in male or good look in general . moral beauty be influence by culture and tradition ( also religion ) of the locality . and moral beauty quality include modesty ; comportment ; respect ; charisma ; cleanliness and others . intellectual beauty be wisdom or practical use of knowledge . we can see that ; though it be not wrong ; most people judge beauty base on the physical only ; but this be just a part of beauty call `` look '' and be only skin- deep ; not the total beauty . a true and total beauty be a person that have a reasonable amount of the physical ; moral and intellectual beauty . this be the standard use for most beauty pageant ; but offcourse ; the moral and intellectual part be usually play low . your grandma can be a moral and intellectual beauty but not a looker ! ... atleast not anymore . ; ) . what might be beautiful to one be not to the other since everyone have a different standard of measure ; but can agree on a general level . on a final note ; since physical beauty can tarnish with time ; timelesss beauty can be say to be the inner moral and intellectual beauty of any person . everyone can be beautiful ; ... without surgery . think about it .

 http : //www.officialwire.com/main.php ? action=posted & rid=148624 acai berry scam : dark side of online marketing consumers lose money not weight ; the truth about acai berry be now expose for the mass acai berry have be know to have countless health benefit but with no relevant data to support the fact . despite the lack of data ; modern day people have embrace acai berry a their next best thing to lose weight and gain a healthy body ; skin and digestive system . but the truth be that acai berry benefit be overrate . acai palm ; derive from the euterpe genre of palm culture in the brazilian rain forest be know to have antioxidant property ; which be true . but the antioxidant need to be as good for health a it be present to the common man . also ; a acai berry be not directly consume by human being ; more than half the beneficial property of the fruit go in vain . after process and convert the berry into supplement ; it be present in the form of dietary pill ; concentrate juice ; beverage ; instant drink ; smoothy ; yoghurt or be eaten whole a a fruit . when take a a whole fruit ; the benefit be genuine ; but not otherwise . acai berry scam have be expose today because of the scientific data that reveal that there have not be any research or investigation about the claimed benefit of the fruit . producers of acai supplement have present unproven claim and declaration to people about the health benefit of the fruit and it antioxidant property ; but these be all unsubstantial claim . the truth be that acai berry have only very negligible amount of antioxidant ; which be quite less than what you can find in other type of berry and fruit . it need to be bring to light that there be no such benefit of acai berry that scientist could have point out . acai berry and product make from the same have not earn an approval from the fda ; and the potency of these product be questionable . there have be many talk show and conference regard the false claim of acai berry a a weight loss supplement ; yet people be simply reluctant to acknowledge the fact that acai berry be simply not acceptable accord to medical and scientific term . many consumer of acai product have actually suffer from health complication in the recent past . it should be consider a awareness for the mass ; a acai berry product have almost flood the market today . despite the warning and acai berry scam reveal on the internet every other day ; still there seem to be a lack of communication that need to be bridge . internet have have a great influence in market acai berry product . however ; it have also contribute in reveal the acai berry scam ; which people have often overlook . as company come up with potential free trail offer ; customer fall prey to these lucrative offer and accept them . in the quest to try out these product ; they often end up endanger their health . acai berry do not have any miraculous property ; it be just like any other fruit that have not be research or scientifically test to have any medicinal property . the only presence of antioxidant do not make it a weight loss product as well . hence ; prevention be advise . for further information on this ; you can see : http : //www.acaiberry-info.com/acaiberry

 hello.. if you have qnb account ; you can apply for master e card.qnb offer it customer a secure way to shop online . the mastercard e-card have be specifically design to allow only internet transaction . it can not be use at atms and pos terminal at shop . qnb mastercard e-card be issue a supplementary card to the main credit card with a low credit limit . enjoy your online shopping once you get this..
 in cbq they be offer virtual card .
 some bank also offer a pre-paid internet shop card . functions more like a debit card than a credit card ; becuase you purchase the card in a set amount and then spend it via internet purchase ; rather than have a credit limit . i know for sure that doha bank do this last year ; and i have hear that other bank do as well . at doha bank you need to be an account holder . hope this help .

 visiting qatar on visit visa or business visa after rp cancellation does any 1 have idea that one can visit qatar on visit or business visa after rp cancellation ? do that 2 year limit applies on entry to qatar on all visas ?
 i doubt if above answer r give by professional ?
 uarif ; i be in this situation recently and i can assure you ; from personal experience ; that without noc you can not enter the country on a visit or business visa . if your family be still in doha ( father ; mother ; brother etc ) you can enter on a family visit visa which be valid for one month extendable upto six month . that be the only option that you have . of course ; if you be hold another gcc rp ; then you can enter with an on-arrival visa ( provide your profession fall in the eligible category ) . make sure that the first time you fly to doha in this instance ; you fly via the national carrier i.e . qatar airways . hope this be helpful .

 due to high demand of gold in india & other country because of festival and safe money to invest .

 i know it be hard to wait ; especially give the current economic uncertainty ; but none of u ( include the developer and the bank ) could have predict what have happen ; on a global scale ; over the last few month ; so we be all have to adjust to the new reality which we didnt foresee when we originally make the investment . as any investment be about confidence ; it do n't make sense to 'talk down ' the project ; or encourage rumour about how awful the project be . if you look at other thread on this subject ; you can see that those directly involve in the construction be all proud of it : only those unconnected but with 'inside knowledge ' ( ie from friend of friend ) be predict doom . again ; i suggest that you go down to the site and speak to the developer to get a clearer picture which will help you plan .
 no one live at the pearl yet . as there be no water or electricity service yet . udc and kharamma be lock in a power struggle over cost and the poor buyer of flat be the loser .

 same question
 here be some thing that might help . firstly ; the bare minimum stuff . 1 ) salary of 7000 or high ( sometimes they approve for 6000 also ) . 2 ) six month bank statement with salary transfer . 3 ) you need to be an rp holder . 4 ) your designation on visa shld be respectable . something like engineer or doctor or manager or accountant etc . believe me point 4 be the most important . i have a friend who earn 15k per month ; but due to lack of visa his company have give him a field operator visa for temp purpose ; and now he be not able to sponser his wife . now that you get the basic straight ... you need a few document . 1 ) go to some arabic type guy near sofitel ( there be lot of them there ) . 2 ) they have a sample of no objection certificate . get it type in arabic with your detail . 3 ) get the offer letter ( they have sample ) also type from them . 4 ) get 3 copy of 2 & 3 and get them sign and seal from ur sponsor . 5 ) take those doc to the labour department and submit them . they will keep 1 copy and return you 2 more . keep 1 for yourself and give 1 to your employer / sponsor . if you already have a 6 month bank statement ; then you can readily apply for an rp . if not ; you can get your wife here on a visit visa and later convert it to rp . to apply for or visit visa ; get the visa form fill ( from same sofitel place ) and take it to any visa centre ( meisaimer center be good a it have good number of counter ) . all the best .

 vitamin d be use by the body to process calcium for the bone . it 's naturally occur when you 're in the sunlight . i strongly suggest that you take a walk after you eat right before sunset . make sure that you eat calcium containing product ( milk ; cheese ) as well a item from all the food group ( vegetable ; meat ; dairy ) . if you be lactose intolerant ; try take calcium supplement . it 's best if u allow your body to produce vitamin d naturally instead of take medication .

 drsam ... thats great info . noted .
 however all official study ca n't recommend sunlight exposure for vit d since toomany risk ( dna deterioration ; cancer skin ; sun stroke ; eye problem ... ) and to many parameter ( skin color ; location ; time ; uv index ; ... ) these official study stress on the intake or vit d. for the ultime reference ( a 1100+ page ) that sum up all research ; and all previous study : http : //books.nap.edu/openbook.php ? record not for faint hearted tho ! have a look .
 thanks drsam . do you know if deificiency can cause low mood ; anxiety etc
 the link between vitamin d deficeincy and depression ( bipolar disorder ; low-mood ... ) exist . scientific study place hypovitd a a risk factor ; not a trigger causal factor of depression . tablef-6 evidence map for neuropsychological functioning page 1022 http : //books.nap.edu/openbook.php ? record & page=1022

 you will need a special permit to bring any dual use chemical into the country ; include : 1 . civil defense + environmental commission + municipality approve storage facility 2 . importation of hazardous substance must be specifically mention on company cr . you can not import hazardous substance in your personal capacity . 3 . in addition to the above ; you will need to submit hazmat data sheet along with import document to custom with civil defense and environmental approval with each and every consignment . 4 . if material be classify a explosive or highly flammable ; you will also need to have the document approve by ministry of interior ( police ) . this apply to anything from paint thinner to you name .

 automatic ... .anywhere anytime ... . why to keep change gear ? 1 . in automatic the chance of error during change of gear speed especially at roundabout be zero . 2 . also with automatic one can use both hand to control the vehicle at r/abouts and dont have to keep shift gear thereby give improve control . the above 2 add to give one the split second advantage when other driver make some error and you can either slow down abruptly or give way swiftly . and of course one can slow down to a halt and then accelerate in an instant without go from 4th gear to 1st and then 2nd and 3rd & finally 4th . the only advantage manual have be the pickup one can get from 1st gear and the driver decide when to switch to a high gear and this be usually do faster manually .
 manual of course ; u can control the car more . plus ; sport car be manual..

 hello ; please do the following step : 1 ) remove the battery ; check the ac adapter pin . plug only ac adapter to the laptop and check if laptop power on only on ac-adapter . 2 ) if laptop power on use only ac adapter-shut down the system ; plug in the battery . go-to the bios by use f2 key while the system startup and check if the adapter be list in the bios ( it will be list a 60w/90w or accord to the model of the adapter ) . 3 ) if the adapter be not list in the bios ; you can try update the bios by download the late bios update from www.support.dell.com . while update the bios ensure that both battery and ac adapter be plugged-in . 4 ) if the problem persist ; please replace the ac adapter . as it be 8 month old ; it be under warranty . best of luck !
 i have same problem with my hp notebook and after a few trip to the service center the problem persist ; they say it a software problem with vista . after a lot of google this be what work for me : 1.click start and type device in the search field ; then select device manager . 2.expand the batteries category . 3.under the batteries category ; right-click the microsoft acpi compliant control method battery listing ; and select uninstall . warning : do not remove the microsoft ac adapter driver or any other acpi compliant driver . 4.on the device manager taskbar ; click scan for hardware change . alternately ; select action > scan for hardware change . windows will scan your computer for hardware that do n't have driver instal ; and will install the driver need to manage your battery 's power . the notebook should now indicate that the battery be charge .  my name craig ; md of mirage properties here in qatar . regards your query i can pretty much second what most others have say so far . if you 're a single person work in west bay area then you 're good off find an apartment in a good quality building near to work . villa compound here be usually gear towards family living a most be 4-5 bed+ property . however ; say that we have just release an apt compound ; on al waab st ; which would give the best of both world . sadly for you ; these have all be lease i 'm afraid . if you do opt for a pearl apt ; or one of the good tower in the business district ; you will usually get all the facility you would find on a compound and be live with like minded people . when search for property please be aware that there be 3 type of furnished basis here in qatar : unfurnished ( u/f ) - mean you get nothing ; not even kitchen appliance and sometimes no ac either ; in very extreme case and usually in old property you do n't even get kitchen cabinet . semi furnished ( s/f ) - kitchen appliances ; a/c 's and sometimes curtain . fully furnish ( f/f ) - kitchen appliances ; furniture ; curtains ; tv ; dvd and sometimes bed ; kitchen utensil ; crockery ; cutlery etc ( but not usual ) . price difference between s/f & f/f be usually around qr1 ; 500 - qr3 ; 000 extra per month . if you 'd like to get an idea of what 's available in the market at the moment ; please take a look on our site www.mirageproperty.com ; which list a whole range of property ; both exclusive to ourselves and from the open market . if you see anything you like and want more info ; please feel free to contact u through the site and one of my agent will be in contact . i hope we can be of help . kind regard craig at mirage

 traffic law fines/points system action : 7.-driving a vehicle on the road recklessly or carelessly or in a way that endanger life of people and property . penalty imprisonment of minimum one month and maximum 3 year and /or fine of minimum 10000 riyals and maximum 50000 riyals accord to article no ( 94 ) . the punishment will be double by the minimum level in case of repeat the same violation accord to article number ( 98 ) . some more detail action 38.- exceeding post speed limit on the road . penalty qr.500 ; and to be increase by qr.100 for every 10 km / hour of speed to the maximum penalty of qr.1000 .

 where can woman seek some legal advice ? i be a female overseas contract worker here in qatar who be a victim of estafa . what government agency should i go to ask some legal advice ?
 ministry of human rights somewhere in westbay
 what be estafa ?
 if estafa be what mj say ; then what human right can do with that ? honestly ; i think nobody can do anything about it ; unless there be a legal write contract of lending/borrowing money . even in this case the procedure be way too long and you might end up with give to the lawyer much more money than you be owe ... < i > < b > ********************* you become responsible forever for what you have tame . antoine de saint-exupry < /b > < /i > < img src= '' http : //cdnll.img1.imagechef.com/w/080610/anmd46ebbf9c8c024ef.gif '' >
 you have 3 option . you may lodge a complaint or blotter with any near police station . if he be a foreigner ; the police will give him a visit together with your complaint . if the respondent will not own up ; they can file your complaint with the prosecutor . if the respondent be qatari ; you go to the ministry of human rights and they will assist you there . you may also try your embassy which normally have legal officer familiar with local criminal procedure to assist you . good luck .
 qatar criminal and civil procedure be unique in the entire gulf region . it have both the regular court and the sharia court . for estafa or deceit ; it be normally file with a complaint with the prosecutor and after preliminary investigation ; it will be file with the court of first instance . you need not hire a lawyer since the prosecutor will be your lawyer . but bear in mind to produce evidence on estafa or deceit . if you have no documentary exhibit forget your complaint and charge it to experience . sharia court handle family relation law and criminal case involve qataris and muslim litigant . cases involve foreigner ; civil or criminal be handle by regular court .
 evidence be very important in criminal prosecution . oral testimony will not prove guilt beyond reasonable doubt ; the quantum of evidence require to convict an accuse in a criminal prosecution . the rejoinder of qatarisun be well take ; your respondent can easily deny have receive money from you or simply say that the money be simple loan ; and you have no case for estafa . the essential element of estafa be `` trust '' and `` exchange of good or money '' . prove this both and you have a case for estafa .
 the formality or informality of your document be immaterial . what be material for your case to prosper in ourt be the substance of your document . it must show the nature of your transaction ; mention the good or money he receive ; his name and signature thereon ; and any witness to the transaction . if you part good or money base on his representation ; and which you awfully trust ; and his promise or acknowledgement of pay you back ; and he renege on this promise ; then you have a criminal case for deceit or estafa .
 there you have it ; your reference to the word `` borrow '' presuppose the existence of a simple loan ; and your allegation for estafa be doom . electronic mail or email be now admissible in evidence in court under certain qualification . but what you have on hand be evidence of simple loan not estafa . in which case ; if the amount involve be substantial ; you be advise to seek a local lawyer to assist you in file a simple case for sum of money and damage . legal fee here be quite expensive ; prepare with your deep wallet .
 ms j ; promissory note be not evidence of estafa but of loan . promissory note be ancillary document to the principal contract of loan . if one can not pay his loan ; you do not sue him for estafa even if this be accompanied promissory note and with rubber check . issuance of bounching check be not punishable a a crime in qatar if that be what you have in mind .
 i have an evidence . an email conversation a an evidence of borrow money and the promise to pay .
 where can woman seek some legal advice ? i be a female overseas contract worker here in qatar who be a victim of estafa . what government agency should i go to ask some legal advice ?
 thank you for the response .
 rimlaw ... so what be the safe way of transaction ? since cheques & promissory note be not enforceable .
 cheques and promissory note be admissible in evidence for civil case such a collection cases for sum of money ; judicial foreclosure of mortgage ; etc . but not for ciminal prosecution of estafa or deceit . while check may have probative value to establish motive or intent it be not the quantum of proof to establish guilt beyond reasonable doubt . promissory notes on the other hand will disprove estafa since this document will clearly establish a loan transaction . the safe way in transaction involve forebearance of money or exchange of good for money be to have a contract or document that clearly specify the nature of transaction . never get sway by sweet talk person and you might end up scammed .
 lulu hyper on d-ring ; there be an optician shop inside . that 's where i go .
 any optical shop here can do it.. i have my first eye test in pearle opticians in villaggio last year.. then just last week ; i have my lens replace ; it be in the shop inside carrefour ; the guy be kind enough to give a discount..
 mean 2years in qatar and you still dont know where to do eye checkup . i will suggest a hammer whack back ofyour head and see if you still have a clear vision . seriously common . try ahli hospital consultation fee be 300qr . rest depends .

 if you leave qatar without pay your personal loan ; definitely a case will be file against you then you will be blacklist in the immigration . you should never visit qatar again or else you 'll land in the prison cell . yes ; personal loan be insured but bank ca n't recover it thru default or non payment . insurance be for life only ; mean applicable only if the borrower die .
 there be bank here that be also available in your country even if you will not come back they have authorize agency to confiscate whatever you have in your country
 first of all such act be non recommendable ; by the way all bank be have very strong network all over the world ; they will trace the person out whereever he be ; then u can imagine what they will do ; and secondly within middle east they will black list the person and they will make the person life miserable .
 bank or any lending institution extend such lending to you specially expats on the merit of your integrity thru your sponsor sometimes . they grant loan even they do not know you 100 % ; and you should be thankful to such lending institution . the first thing you should do be to go to the bank and settle everything or else you will be face many consequence in the event you run away from such responsibility . there be a say that say good karma begets good karma.bad karma will likewise begets bad karma . think about this .

 before the month end ; take the visa to the passport office . you can get it extend for another month .
 1 . yes it be extendable for another 5months..1month + 5month = 6months . 2 . yes she have to go for medical test if she will stay for more than 30days in qatar .
 if it be only a tourist visa it will not be extend your aunt have to go back on completion of 1 month.if not ( like personal visit visa etc . ) ; then after 10-15 day of her arrival here you can take her to the health department locate opposite to woqood petrol pump in abu hamour for some simple test ; the result of which will be give within 3 day and then you can go with that result to the immigration department locate behind woqood petrol pump..it 's done..you can extend the visa upto 6 month @ 200 qar p.m .

 where be migrate bird stay i have see lot of bird over doha during evening time . guess they migrate here in winter . do any one know which area ( beach ) they stay be stay ?
 the reason bird migrate be that they be avoid the cold weather brewing in the place they be stay so they move to warmer country . there be a possibility they be just `` pass through '' doha when you notice them . scientifically ; bird can travel thousand of mile so it 's possible doha be not their final stop . they might have head towards iran or beyond ... once they know that the weather in their place have warm up ; they go back .
 i have hear ; bird see on dubai terminal ; try hard to catch up their next flight ; therefore ; security officer object them lol ; to proceed ; guess what ; lol no transit visa lol ;
 juliarose ; if u happen to look carefully ; the bird be come from iran ( the north side ) where the weather be more cold be go south to warmer / tropical climates . there be two type of migration : long-distance migration ; & short-distance migration . as per my knowledge ; some short-distance migrating bird stay in warm region of saudi arabia along the red sea coast ; whereas some more specie travel to egypt ; sudan and far to ethiopia . for long-distance migration ; bird fly as far a south africa too . more information can be find on wikipedia .

 there be no rule in qatar for the air ticket and stuff . it will depend on the offer they provide to you . i mean what offer they mention in your labour contract . so a baldrick2dogs say ; u can either cash out economy class fair or fly use a business class . simple !
 i would suggest take the business class travel offer much better.. -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- - he who dares wins
 iata fair be 50 % + more than the normal fair ; if my calculation be not wrong .
 yv2r baldrick have reply very correct ; if you want your company to issue a ticket ; it will be business class or if you want to encash the ticket money you will get only economy fare . all airlines be approve by iata ; mean international air transport association ; agent who have iata approval will follow rule and regulation ; there be many agent who dosent have this iata ; they give less price mean ; to survive in competitve market they share their comission what they get from iata agent with the passenger.dealing with approve iata agent be always beter .

 do you mean you come in on a tourist/visitor 's visa and be now in the process of obtain a work visa/residency permit ? your visitor 's visa be good for 30 day ; renewable once ; a a uk citizen . your employer must have start your rp work within 7 day of your arrival . mandi

 nope ; completely illegal . your employer should have get you a business visit visa . it allow for work in qatar on a temporary basis . mandi
 work on visitor visa how long can one work in qatar with just visitor visa ; iff at all ? cheer
 to work on a visit visa ; not for money and not even for free . otherwise you must apply for a business visa .
 to have business visa ; and/or on arrival visa these be the only 2 visa allow you to work in qatar . and by the way these 2 visa be extendable ; business visa you can extend for another 2 month ; and the on arrival visa you can extend for another one month .
 cheers for imput ; now where be the best hotel for brunch on friday ?
 mohammad jabr ; visa on arrival be a tourist visa by it nature ; with only difference that for the certain nationality this tourist visa be available at the airport upon arrival ; without apply in advance in their coutries . but it be still tourist visa ; and therefore it be illegal to work on the type of visa.. the only legal work visa for the short-term employment/consultancy/ internatioanl company meeting and worksops ; etc . be a business visa .

 wow ; i just read the end of this thread a i just get my internet connection back after 2 week . wow ichwill what an unhelpful and negative comment ! ! ! qtel smsed the reference number and appointment date ... nearly a week after we apply to move the line ( at the main qtel office by te way ) . phew ! but then ; they do n't turn up on the appointment date . when i call to complain they say they have call and we do n't pick up ; but no missed call on either of our phone . we be issue with another date a week after the initial date ( today ) and thank goodness they turn up this time and my line be work again . i guess 2 week without a connection be n't that bad ; i actually expect bad .
 if you be under your father sponsorship then you do n't need to change your sponsorship ; you only need a no objection letter from your father allow you to work . if you say you have a job line up then your future employer will have to arrange the job contract and have it endorse my the ministry of labour
 for me an asian here 's what i have do -first fill up a work permit form from labor office ( you can go to the office or from the web ) fill it up in arabic and complete all the requirement list at the back page ( except the police clearance ) -bring the complete work permit form with attachment to labor office and they will give you a schedule/endorsement letter for police clearance ( they will not take your complete form or monetary payment unless you have the result of your police clearance ) -after a week when you have the endorsement letter from labor office you have to go to police clearing office at salwa ; fill up police clearance form with requirement list at the back ; you could wait for a week or two for the result . -lastly you have to go back to labor office with your 1 . completed work permit form with all the attachment ( list at the back ) 2 . result of your police clearance 3 . payment and in the same day they will provide you with your work permit id or you can ask the company 's mandoop to do that for you ( a lot easy : - ) )
 ok thanx alot for the reply.i dont want to work illegally . so i just have to get my father to type up a no objection letter and give it to my employer ? thanx in advance
 -work permit qar500 -stamping your contract with english arabic translation qar 30 -police clearance +/- qar50 ( i forget ; sorry ) -spending on send and receive ; to and from your country attest document copy ( list at the back of the form ) ; and attestation on doha ( varies base on your country and their process i guess ) cheers !
 the government of qatar do not have income tax . your gross salary = your net salary . however ; if your country have a tax treaty with qatar you may be liable for tax in your home country . you can research this by google this on the internet .

 there be lot of online review of the netbooks you mention ; most of which speak highly of the samsung ; acer aspire one and hp mini . with these netbooks your personal preference of keyboard size ; screen size ; touchpad layout and battery life be more important than the processor speed ; a they pretty much all use the same atom processor now . i recently buy the hp mini 2140 from lulu centre for qar 1388 ; and i be very happy with it . it cost between us $ 450 to $ 550 online ; so it seem like a good buy . note that the lulu one only have the 3 cell battery ; which last around 2.5 hr ; vs the 6 cell battery with 5 hr or more . the 6 cell battery can be purchase online for around qar200 if you need to use it for long period without a power socket . a friend have three different netbooks and like the samsung best . unfortunately for him ; it have a heat failure and have be return for repair . i also like the look of the aspire one and the toshiba ; a they have slightly taller screen ( 1024x600 vs 1024x576 on the hp ) ; and square touchpad . on the weekend i saw them at jarir bookstore ( opposite ramada ) with 6 cell battery for qar1499 . i be think of get one of these to try along side the 2140 ; but just ca n't really justify have two . most likely your decision will come down to which one you think look best ; after all ; they 're more of an accessory than a computer . they also come in red ; with flower ; so get the right one ; or you will have to buy a new handbag and pair of shoe ! jason

 all ; thank you for the insightful response . i 'm an operation manager in the fmcg industry the u.s and have 5+ year of management experience in the field of supply chain ; logistics and warehouseing . are there any good recruiting agency ; which i can utilize to help guide my search ? contact information ? websites ? thank you again for your help .
 i do n't mean to be discourage to you by any stretch but most people do n't just up and relocate to qatar . we be bring by specific company for certain position . that 's why westerners can be pay a considerable amount of money - they be recruit and hire from overseas because of a very particular set of skills/experience need by a firm in qatar . when our contract be over we will ; nay must ; however sadly return to our home country . it be not a free-market economy . there be some generic recruiting agency but your best bet be directly with a company that need your specialized skill or a headhunter act on that company 's behalf . if you have n't a skill that be in high demand ( i.e . transplant surgeon ) you will be compete for job with people from close country which traditionally tend to underbid their service . mandi
 http : //www.gulftalent.com/home/index.php http : //www.keyresourcesinc.com/ another couple of known agency around middle east and they do respond to your application ; i recommend it to some of my friend and they be lucky enough to find a job from them . i use to know a lot of this agency but i change computer ; i could n't find them again . but will look for it in a next couple of day or so . cheers ! < p align= '' center '' > < a href= '' http : //www.wilsoninfo.com '' target= ''  '' > < img src= '' http : //i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc229/wil5037/tweety.gif '' border= '' 0 '' alt= '' free clipart '' > < /a > have a nice day !

 qnb notes ! ! ! ! be it a good idea ? ? what do you think about the qnb note ? ? is it a good idea for investment ?
 dont know ; whats a qnb note ?
 qnb note be an investment product where the capital be guaranteed - so at the end of the investment period you be at least guarantee your initial investment . the investment be link to the performance of the qatar stock exchange over the next 2 year . obviously nobody know how the stock market will do but i be pretty confident that over the next 2 year the investment should do good than the return on a fixed deposit inshallah ! so if you have an investment strategy that involve equity then this product have get little downside - principal guarantee so if all else fail - it just the opportunity cost on the money for 2 year - versus the upside of the qatar stock market . dont need to be an einstein to figure this one out ... .
 you should be able to do the same by follow these two simple step ; 1 . take 75 % of the total amount you want to put into this scheme into a high yielding fix deposit scheme with any major like cbq . 2 . the remain 25 % ; invest in equity yourself . if the market do well ; you will make much more than you will with the note ; if the market fare very badly ; you will still have earn interest on the fixed deposit to offset the 25 % loss on your equity investment portfolio . rgds ; j.j
 my two bit be ; ; that min . investment be qar . 20 k for a tenor of 2 year . if u put 20 k in bank ; u get max . 6 % per annum.. i think ; that in two year . qe will give u at least return of 6 % p.a keep in view ; the qe at around 7300 nowadyas.. the bad scenario be that u will get your 20 k back after 2 years.. having invest directly in qe directly ; i have burn my hand . however ; i still be in favour of qnb note 1 ; due to it timing . as qe be still not go too high .
 i be also interested in this .. and like to know more about it .. i be watch : ) ..please update more

 i know that you can use a qatari driving license support by your qatari rp to rent a car in the uae ; but if you leave here to work there would imagine you need to do a test for the uae ; unless your home license can be automatically transfer . should also imagine that once your rp be cancel your qatari license irrespective of date on it would also be cancel .
 your qatar dl be valid in qatar & can be convert to omani license ; bahrain ; kuwait but not uae . u need give test in uae.if you fail u need to take class open file and keep try your luck . get uae license be not so easy a u get in qatar . u need good luck and if not u shed lot money in attempt . overall ur qatari license be not valid to get uae dl . u need to go through above process .
 i get my driver 's licence in saudi arabia and when i transfer here in qatar ; it be still valid for 2 month . i be able to convert it to qatar driver 's licence because saudi and qatar be part of gcc . i just do n't know if this be also applicable if you go out of qatar and convert it to uae driver 's license when you work there . but i have a strong feeling that it can be do since uae be also part of gcc .
 i be from uae ; have valid uae license ; i confirm no other gcc or asian dl can be directly convert to uae dl . apply for a road test if u pas ur lucky.if u fail u need to take minimum 5 class . then try till u succeed .
 qatar driving license will be valid in all gcc countries hi all ; i be have qatar driving license ; will this license will be valid in all gcc country ? if i get a job in uae ; this qatar driving license will be valid in uae ; or again i want to apply for drive license .
 yes it be valid in all gcc country . once you get the uae residency you go to the uae traffic department with the original qatari licence and copy too ; you pay 100 dirhams and get the uae driving licence

 the state of qatar issue tourist visas on arrival for national of 33 country : andorra ; australia ; austria ; belgium ; brunei ; canada ; denmark ; finland ; france ; germany ; greece ; hong kong ; iceland ; ireland ; italy ; japan ; liechtenstein ; luxemburg ; malaysia ; monaco ; new zealand ; norway ; portugal ; san marino ; spain ; sweden ; singapore ; south korea ; switzerland ; the netherlands ; usa ; uk ; vatican city . this service allow traveler or hotel to apply for a visa online ahead of time . applicants be require to supply a sponsor id in the application ; which can be from a relative living in qatar or an id supply by a hotel . citizens from outside the above country should arrange for a tourist visa through a qatari embassy or hotel in qatar . source : hukoomi

 once your family arrive here ; you can go for medical in medical commision ( abu hamoor ) .you should take original passport and visa copy with 100 riyal . you will get the result in couple of day after stamp ... one have to take passport ( original & copy ) ; passport size photograph plus copy of visa . forms be available at the medical commission & will be fill in by the female staff for around qr 10/each .
