 navas ; so you be lucky to get the result on the same day ... so kindly do n't say that i give the wrong information..i 've hardly give any wrong advises to anyone on ql so far..you can check my track records..ok ...
 go to medical commission there work hour 7:30 till 11am the document need passport and visa copy and the atm card for payment thats all no need to fill any form and no photograph .they will fill the information on the counter and charge will be 100 riyal and they will post the result to immigration department it will take 1 week in my case i take 1 week but u can check the result online after 1 or 2 day but see a online result do not mean that result be already with immigration it will take some time so well to go after 1 week to immigration after medical
 they do n't work on saturdays . i just take my parent and go last saturday at 6:30 be after i read here in ql that the commission work from saturday to thursday but it be close . they work from sundays to thursdays .

 well ; it 's a tough time to arrive ; that 's for sure ! there be western-oriented place that can be visit during the day ; but you 'll have to remember that there be no eating ; drinking ; smoking or gum-chewing allow while out during the day . that say ; here be a few place i know that be open at least for a little while ; each day and then also in the evening . carrefour - 9 a.m. - 1 a.m. sat-thurs - villagio & city center megamart- 8:30 a.m. - 1 a.m. sat-thurs - landmark ; the centre just about all the mall be open from 10 a.m. to around 1 or 2 and then re-open around 8 in the evening ; so you can get a few hour of shopping in during the day and then go back at night if you run out of time . i understand the iftar buffet be marevelous and serve at most hotel . that would be your late evening meal ; and well worth the wait from what i 'm told ( i 've only be here since late july ; so i have n't have a chance to do all the ramadan thing offer yet ) find a reliable taxi driver ; and you 'll be all set to pop around to the various mall to get well acclimate to the area . once the heat ease off in a couple month ; it would be easy to get around by get a drop off at a central location and then walk around the city a bit . get a marhaba at a bookstore if you do n't already have one ; it be the best resource for all this kind of stuff ! have fun !

 what 's dhal bhati ? need to research more on this food = )
 it be one of the most popular unleavened flat-breads in indian cuisine and be make by pan fry whole-wheat flour on a tava . [ 2 ] the paratha dough usually contain ghee or cooking oil which be also layer on the freshly prepared paratha . [ 3 ] parathas be usually stuff with vegetable ; such a boiled potato ; radish or cauliflower and/or paneer ( south asian cheese ) . a paratha ( especially a stuffed one ) can be eat simply with a blob of butter spread on top but it be best serve with pickle and yoghurt ; or thick spicy curry of meat and vegetable . some people prefer to roll up the paratha into a tube and eat it with tea ; often dip the paratha into the tea ... . btw ... ..omlet stuff paratha square in shape ... .available in bombay .

 i will speak for the samsung shg d880 . the following be from it user manual guide : -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- sim card switch your phone support the dual sim card mode ; enable you to use two sim card at the same time without change them . activate sim card and select the primary sim card . 1 . in the idle mode ; press the swithching button at the left side of the phone . 2 . scroll to the sim card you want to use and select enable or primary . 3 . press { options } and select save . if you change the primary sim card ; the phone automatically turn off and back on . ** you can use browser ; e-mail ; multimedia message ; and stk applications service only with the primary sim card . -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- as far a i 'm concerned with my phone ; it do n't need restart since the sim from my country be only use to receive sms message and not for call . that work for me just fine . you can always go to the store bring with you one qtel and one vodafone sim card and you can try it for yourself before you decide to buy .

 think she should take paracetamol not panadol-check
 panadol=paracetamol=acetaminophen . good quality vitamin c be ok ; too .
 generally all kind of medications take during pregnancy should be consult with the doctor ; this do not mean that you can not take any medication.. pandol be genrally safe and well a vit c
 yes it be safe to take panadol and vitamin c during pregnancy . but if you be already take prenatal vitamin then skip vitamin c..

 what be his job & position he receive this offer then we can comment . but still you ask about the family living in qatar i will tell you some fact . as per the present rule your salary should be more than 7000 qr . then only you can apply for family visa . if you want to hire a single bedroom appartment in qatar you have to pay minimum 5000 qr . living expense for a bachelor will be minimum 700/800 qr . per month ( i think ) ; then family you can imagine . qatar be very expensive . before go to accept any offer from here please re-think twice . is that suitable for you ? or consult with any friend or relative live in qatar . all the best .
 how be the salary range for a good life in qatar my husband get an offer from a qatar construction company with a salary of 2500 qar + accomodation . please let me know it be a good offer or not . also ; be the family status possible with this salary and what be the minimum salary for family status ?
 family not possible.\ accept or reject offer a per ur financial condition and job designation . for labour salary be around 800 qr along accomodation . average salary for sacretary be around 4000 qr . therefore ; think and decide a per ur condition . normal skilled person can get easily more then 7000 qr .

 u can ; obtain the reentry visa from immigration ; then u can re enter again to doha .
 based on your nationality ; you can get visa on arrival at uae . else keep follow visas ready : 1 . visit visa to uae 2 . visa for ksa 3 . visa for qatar if you be not in the list of 32 approved country ; you will be deny visa at the immigration point at uae and qatar .
 the visit visa be only one entry ; so you can not use same visa if you go for exit in qatar . you must obtain another visa when you try to re-enter in qatar .

 following document may u need to go for direct test ; 1 . qid copy 2. your home country d/l ( original + copy ) 3 . letter from your sponsered company with signature already approve by traffic police . 4. picture with blue backgroung ( 2 nos ) . 5 . aplication form for eye test . take all these document ; 1st go for eye test ( traffic police or any school ) ; test your eye ; then go to khalifa marroor ( traffic police ) get approval for test ; then go to any school ; there be office from traffice police will give you test date and charge some fee only through credit card . reach on mentioned date and time for test ... . best of luck .
 u should take exam from any driving school here in doha to convert ur lisence to qatar lisence ... .no need to re schooling again .

 hi friend ; those nasty bed bug be not only live on the bed . they live on the curtain ; furniture and even under carpet . if you leave them untouched for some time they will increase in number . uv light be good for kill them from your bed but you can not take everything to sun light . it will be good if you treat all the material in your room at the same time . take your bed to the balcony or terrace and leave it there for two three day in the hot sun light turn it upside down very often . you may use the pesticide ( the one from carrefour ) in your room for one or two day . spray well and keep the room close . you should use it vigorously . this will kill the bed bug in your room as well a on your bed . make sure that your friend in the other room should also do it at the same time otherwise you will not be able to clear them .

 mobile phone ; internet and television hi there i be move with my wife and son to doha in january 2013 . i would like to ask anyone who know ; how quick or difficult it be to get up and run with mobile phone and also if i speak to our landlord about get the internet at our new home or be this do by ourselves ? and what do i need to set up for tv channel in doha ? any advise would be greatly appreciate .
 bring an unlocked phone ( that use a normal sim card ) with you . you can get a pre-paid ( pay a you go ) hala ( service name ) sim from qtel in the arrival terminal after custom on production of your passport . once you get your rp ; you can keep the number and change to shawry ( service name ; 30day roll contract ) . with regard to qtel landline and internet ; you can get a pre-paid dongle initially ; then again once you have a rp you can get qtel landline and broadband connect . dont hold your breath regard how quick they do it though ; we 've be here for a couple of month ; have my rp for 6 week and still havent get broadband . you will have to get permission from your landlord ; but this shouldnt be a problem . hope this help

 after arrival at doha ; u can do medical test for visa extn ... ... ... before no use to do medical .
 you dont need a medical for a one week visit . a medical be require if you be go to apply for residence or a long term visit visa . then you need a medical and it must be do here in doha
 medical test be mandatorily require for people come here to stay for 6 month and more . these be basic test only . you can go for a complete health check-up if something about your health bother you .
 there be no need for a medical before enter doha for a visit..

 forget about al ahli hospital ! ! ! they charge qr500 only for consultation and the doctor be useless ! ! ! i live here 7years and have 3 kid raise in qatar ; and i promise you ; al ahli be not the way to go . there be a good doctor ; a female right behind the aramex office close to decoration rb . i think it family medical centre . then there be future medical centre opposite villagio ; i go there twice with my young ; be ok ; not super keen with their treatment . it depend why you need to see a doctor . if your child just have a normal cold ; al saad medical centre be great ! i dont have good experiance with any other gov . clinic ; but can take my hat off for the al saad branch ! i know by experience and have many friend that will sware by them . if your child just have a regular cough ; due to the change in weather it likely due to an alergiec reaction to the dust in the air ; they will prescribe you with antihestamine = zyrtec and then a very good and herbal cough syrup = prospan ; these two be all you need every time you kid pass through a viral flu . welcome and good luck . hope my info help .
 yup charlepunt ; go to a private clinic or to a health centre ; if it 's a viral infection or the seasonal flu ; they will give you paracetamol ; prospan ; anti histamine and if the infection have be there for some time ; then they will add a antibiotic to it . so it all depend upon what kind of treatment you be seek . by al sadd medical centre ; be you refer to the ped emergency centre ?

 i give you some breakdown ( practical ) . < b > single person < /b > < b > accommodation ( flat sharing ) : < /b > 1600~2800qr -1 room ( furnish & unfurnished ) with/without bath attach with free all expense exclude food & drinking water . < b > food : < /b > 500~800qr depends on your lifestyle . < b > transportation : < /b > min fare ( taxi : 10qr ; bus : 2qr ) depends on distance of ur flat to your office . well it more intelligent & practical to get accommodation near at ur office . < b > family < /b > < b > accommodation ( flat or villa ) : < /b > 4000qr~7000qr -2~3 room 2 bath ; kitchen ; living ; terrace ; gym etc . no water ; elec ; cable ; internet/tel connection yet . < b > food : < /b > 1000qr beyond ; depend on your lifestyle . < b > transportation : < /b > min fare ( taxi : 10qr ; bus : 2qr ) hope this help . cheers ! < b > transportation : < /b >

 urogulf certificate attestation services as per the new qatar law any certificate that has been issued in any country other than qatar ; has to be attested in that particular country ; before submitting to any qatar government department . we undertake attestation of all original certificates from the ministry of external affairs govt . of india and qatar embassy/consulate - india we have more than 100 branches in india with offices in qatar ; oman ; uae ; and kuwait . we undertake attestation of all documents like - educational documents marriage certificates birth certificates marksheet/transcript experience certificates affidavit ; tc etc if you need of any kind of attestation ; please contact : mr . sunny or ms. ekta 00974 - 5206783 ; 3101862 urogulf 3 c ; 3rd floor ; kaamco building al sadd ; doha ; qatar landmark from ramada signal . towards al sadd plaza before la cigale hotel ; opp . toys r us ; next to almana twin towers ; near bentley or lamborghini car showroom .

 saw landcruiser at busy intersection on al waab yesterday with father drive with toddler on his lap and a zillion other kid jump around all over the place inside . yes ; i know it 's nothing new ; but it really be time the police enforce the law concern this . that kid would just have be mince if he 'd have an accident . makes me want to cry .
 in a major move to curb the grow number of accident and incident of reckless drive on qatars road ; the government yesterday promulgate a new traffic law ; stipulate severe penalty for violator include a point system which would ultimately lead to the cancellation of a habitual offender drive license . decree no 19 of 2007 ; issue by hh the deputy emir and heir apparent sheikh tamim bin hamad al-thani ; state that a driving license may be suspend for three month when the total violation reach 14 point for the first time . if the same person gather 12 point again ; his license would be suspend for six month ; nine month on the accumulation of the next 10 point and one year for the next eight point . ultimately ; a driving license may be cancel if the same offender earn six point for the fifth time . the penalty for use mobile phone while drive have be enhance . the violator will have to pay a minimum fine of qr 3 ; 000 and a maximum fine of qr 10 ; 000 . he be also liable for imprisonment for up to one year . motorists who commit violation such a drive with no authorized license ; drive under the influence of liquor ; drive in the opposite direction of traffic flow ; escape from the accident site ; cause sound and air pollution and exceed the speed limit would be punishable by imprisonment from one month to three year or fin qr10 ; 000 to 50 ; 000 or both . according to the new law ; the punishment for the following offence be also the same a mention above : not wear seat belt ; allow child below 10 year sit in the front passenger seat ; not give way to official motorcade and the vehicle of the police ; civil defense and ambulance ; not leave enough space between two vehicle and motorcyclist allow another passenger sit behind them ( pillion rid ) . the law stipulate that the driver and the front seat passenger should wear seat belt all the time . cyclists should keep to the right side of the road and should ride in one line . motorcyclists be not allow to ride on one wheel . both should wear helmet . violation points system violators of traffic rule will be give negative point a follow : jumping the red light 7 driving in the opposite direction 6 driving under the influence of alcohol 6 exceeding the maximum speed 4 driving recklessly and dangerously 4 driving with defective brake 4 driving with inappropriate license 3 driving with strip or invalid license 3 violating norm of public morality 3 driving an unregistered vehicle 3 driving a vehicle without number plate 3 unauthorized change make to number plate 3 providing wrong information to pass the technical inspection 3 using the vehicle for the wrong purpose 3 blocking the flow of traffic intentionally 3 driving a vehicle without a proper silencer 3 driving a polluting vehicle 3 driving a vehicle that leak any material that can damage the road 3 driving a vehicle which drop load which can endanger the public safety 3 driving on the embankment 3 making a wrong u-turn 3 changing a vital part of the vehicle without a write permission from the authority 3 giving the license to someone who have no license 2 driving a vehicle with unclear number plat 2 driving with only one number plate ; or change their shape or detail 1 refraining from give drive license to traffic police 1 trucks violate the load condition 1 trucks violate the width ; length ; or weight regulation of the vehicle 1 driving a technically unsafe vehicle 1 using light ; horn ; microphone ; or other machine against the law 1 disobeying traffic sign 1 [ img dude|desc=happiness come only once dont miss it|link=none|align=left|width=|height=0 ]

 just open the image in any image editing software even in paint ; click resize and enter the desired resolution or size you want .
 simple step : 1 . right click on picture 2 . click on `` open with '' 3 . click on `` paint '' 4 . after open in paint ; click on left top `` file '' 5 . click on `` save as '' 6 . give a file name and location & `` save '' it will substantially reduce the size of the picture without change the resolution or dimension ! !

 i think you 're have a wrong picture in your mind . if your baby be bear in qatar ; he/she will not be issue with visit visa . visit visa be issue only to a person outside qatar and for the purpose of visit . if you have do the birth certificate and have sign the document at cid ( due to 2 sponsers for you and your wife ) ; your baby be issue with the rp . i think it 's good you show your baby rp ( or visa a you say ) to somebody who can read arabic and get confirm .
 something not right here ... my husband and i be with different sponsor . our baby be bear a few month back ; and be issue a family visa . quite straightforward . the only extra step be u 'll need to go to the cid office and show them ur paper . once the baby get his passport ; u 'll need to go back there with a copy of the passport .  hit up al shamal road and start count your distance from landmark shopping mall . keep head north on al shamal road ( not al khor road which take you straight to al khor and pass the lusail intl . circuit on your left ) for about 75.55km you will come to an interchange ( still under construction ) with a small blue sign before the bridge reading [ al fuwairit > ] you will want to take the dirt road with that sign and keep drive down a very bumpy road until you hit the fishing village . to get to the beach ; take a left before the village and follow the unpaved road to the beach . got a gps ? also ; would n't recommend go there without a 4x4 ; some spot have nasty soft sand . check it out on google earth before you go . feel free to pm . good luck !
 head northwest to al shamal road . landmark set km to `` 0 '' after 77kms turn right . after 3.9 km turn leave for 450meters . youl be in the area .
 whaiql 's blog be really nice ; with picture too . you turn leave just before you enter the village ; the road look like the 5th picture from the top in whaiql 's blog . trees on either side and a wooden barricade . again ; to the 4x4 issue ; some spot do have soft sand . you can probably find a way through on hard ground though . it 's not an unpopular beach ; so if you do get stick ; there should be someone around to dig you out ; especially on the weekend .

 uk eng qatar.. fyi 1 . in a allh ( ) be an arabic term evoke by arabic ; persian ; turkish ; urdu and bengali speaker to indicate hope for an aforementioned event to occur in the future . the phrase translate into english a `` god willing '' or `` if it be god 's will '' ; sometimes speak a dv ; the latin abbreviation for deo volente or simply `` hopefully '' . 2 . usage of insha'allah derives from islamic scripture ; surat al kahf ( 18 ) :24 : `` and never say of anything ; 'i shall do such and such thing tomorrow . except ( with the say ) : 'if god will ! ' and remember your lord when you forget ... '' and religion be the first and foremeost part of muslims ; and our all affair be control by teaching under islam ... . so where ever a true muslim be ... . spirit of islam be there . let me know if you need further clarification . think like a man of action ... ... ... .act like a man of thoughts ! ! ! !
 you can change it in qatar without any test . go to nearby drive school and ask for the procedure .
 drive licence from dubai dear all ; i have obtain my drive licence in dubai ; will it be valid in qatar or will i have to repass it ? thank you in advance
 the will change it for you in qatar ; not test be require .
 if you have a valid uae drive licence ; prepare the following document 1-no objection certificate from the sponsor ; 2-application form for transfer the licence ; type in arbic 3-copy of the uae driving licence ; 4-two colour photo ; 5-copy of the passport . please go to the traffic department ( licence authority ) submit the above mention documents.they will check your document and send you to the next department for finish the eye test ( free of charge ) after finish the eye test go to the initial location and take the token from the reception ... .wait a few min ... ... ... ... . you can see after a short while your token no in the counter screen . submit all the 5 above mention document along with the following ... ... ... .. 1-original uae drive licence 2-id card ( if you dont have ; plaese keep your original passport ) 3-credit card -- -- -qr-250/ ( they will not accept amount by cash ) within 5 min you will get your qatar drive licence best regard muhammed fausi
 yes ; accord to my experience you just need the passport copy the noc ; the eye test ; the copy of dubai dl and 250 qar ; they simply give you the license . he whole process take one hour only . you must have a credit card to pay they do not take cash .

 owen.. you make me laugh and cry at the same time..chicken pox ? ? .. be n't it a kid ' illness ; particularly those under age 12 ? poor thing.. i be really sorry to hear it.. : ( here be some advice : get rid of chickenpox scars step1 talk to a dermatologist . have your skin and scar evaluate by a professional before you try any product or home remedy . a dermatologist will have many different option for you to consider . step2 apply sandalwood oil and vitamin-e onto your skin . if you scar be not a deep or old ; you can rub some sandalwood oil vitamin-e base product onto your scar . do this consistently for a few month until the scar have heal . step3 try laser treatment . if the scar be old or very deep ; cream and lotion will most likely not work . you might have to consider remove these type of scar with an intense laser treatment at your dermatologist 's office . step4 consider excision by your dermatologist or doctor . excision be the removal of scar by cut them off and stitch the skin close . this option be especially suitable for deep scarring . you will still have some scarring ; but it will be much less noticeable than the chickenpox scar . step5 get a microdermabrasion treatment . microdermabrasion be a deep facial peel that remove a very fine layer of skin . this process will remove scar from on the surface of your skin . get this process do at a clinic or certify spa for best result . good luck sweetie.. : ) < i > < b > ********************* you become responsible forever for what you have tame . antoine de saint-exupry < /b > < /i > < img src= '' http : //cdnll.img1.imagechef.com/w/080610/anmd46ebbf9c8c024ef.gif '' >

 go to rumailla hospitol and meet dr. abdul lattif or sister ameera . they will conduct the test . `` forum ... ... .test conduct clinically ; result declare confidentially with your sponsor and deport publicly ... .. '' results will not be available to anybody ( strictly confidential ) . you will not be deport but you will be treat with best medicine available in the world . free of charge . there be an article write by dr. lattif on gulf times sometime back on hiv issue in qatar .
 god forbid ; if the result be +ve hiv/aids ; the patient will definitely get the best medicine in the world and off course free but he/she be to sacrifice the job and leave the country be an expat ; the treatmetn will be different with a local ! ... .the real story will never get publish in the newspaper .
 there be 2 senarios . if you detect possitive during your medical test for rp . you will be deported . however ; if you detect positive after obtain rp you will not be deport but treat with best medicine available in the world . free of charge .

 i can not publish detail without permission but you can go to communicalble decease centre in rumailla hospitol and contact sister ameera for further detail . she be work there for the last 20 year .
 ... no objection certificate . aside from be use in the construction industry ; it be also use in employment . if you want to transfer to another employer here ; you need to ask you employer to give you an noc . it be not a privilege ; so you be at the mercy of your employer here -- if you want to resign ; leave the country ; or transfer to a new employer here .
 yea joey pretty much sum it up except for the typo where i think he mean to say it be not a right it be a privilege .

 car trade-in issue i be plan to dispose my toyota land cruiser 2004 gx automatic gear due to a possible change with the late model . what be the best way to do it ; sell it thru a direct buyer or have it trade-in in toyota itslef ... .
 yes . trade in be less problem/head ache but less cost . sell it to direct buyer will earn you little sum of money compare to trade-in but you have to deal with different type of people .
 as others be say ; a trade-in be less hassle for you ; but you 'll get much less money for the vehicle . selling it to a private buyer will get your more money but it will be much more of a hassle and potentially take a long time .

 go to medical health centre of the region in which u abide like if u r in ummgualina then go to mughlina health centre or if in rayyan go to the rayyan one othrwise for al khor al khor one . u make there ur own card for 100 qr per year & u hav to renew after every month for qr 100 again . u need to have visa for that . u can hav treatment for free the entire year with one card . however if u dnt want to make card u hav to pay qr 30 per visit . these informations are about the gov one if you wan na make your treatment in any private then u go to national or nearby thr u will find some who give treatment at 5o qr or so . however there r hospitals like appollo u can hav there basically the gov one is affordable ... ..
 go to hmc emergency ; get what u need ; later do ur health card for future requirement
 no ; it 's client approval which be approval should be take from the main project client before start the visa process .
 sounds like good advice from your employer
 client approval hi ; i have accept offer to work in qatar a a civil engineer ; but the company tell me not to hand my notice in until get the client approval . i have not come across this client approval before . i would appreciate your advice and any idea how long this approval will take and be it easy to get this approval ? thanks for your help in advance . mego
 yes ; true they should get prior approval from the client or consultant before they be able to hire you ; mean a copy of your cv be send to them as well and you might be interview by them too..
 all job in qatar on contingent on your get a visa ; so even if you come and go through the last few stage ; your visa may or may not be approve . you would have to leave then and no compensation would be provide . only you can decide if you want to take that leap . thousands be successful ; but if you be one of the very few who be not it can be devastate .
 it be the time require to get your cv approve by the ultimate client ( ashghal etc. ) . it 's for your benefit to get you approve before you hand your notice . as someone mention the visa process may still collapse but at least the client approval stage will confirm that the client will pay for your work lol . your grade and salary be likely to be base on that as well . it take approx . 10-14 day in my case .
 any more thought
 yes ; client approval be generally the preferred way to work for engineering consultancy . the main reason be that company dont want to hire someone from overseas and bring them all the way to qatar and then find out that the client do not like them for some reason like lack of experience ; etc . therefore ; to save themselves the hassle and money ; company usually hire people officially once client have see their cv and be happy to have them on the job . hope this help !

 to begin with ; al in arabic mean the and ilaah mean god . in arabic the denite article the be a part of the word and be not a separate part of it a in english ; so when put the two word together al and ilaah we get the word allah or allaah which mean the god . the i ; the rst letter of ilaah have be omit to facilitate the pronunciation . note that the l in allaah be a dark one . now you must be wonder ; what be the difference between the word allaah and allah ; it simply a matter of spell ; the spelling allah be more common ; but in i-mag we adopt the spell allaah a it represent the true pronunciation of the word in standard arabic . it be note worthy that there be two pronunciation of the word ; one be a colloquial one to which the spelling allah might be more suitable ; and a standard and more correct pronunciation that the spell allaah best represent .
 eid can either b on thursday or friday ; coz hijri month hav only 29 or 30 day ...
 eid be confirm on friday ; coz last two month rajab & shaban be of 29 day ; a per islamic calendar ...
 no saeed bahi ; still sourceless ; but three consecutive month cant be of 30 day ... & everybody in doubt for eid to be on friday ... : )
 eid be on friday it be confirm ; but dont ask for source ;
 relax ; just enjoy iftaar and wait for official call

 i understand you will not have a residency permit ... rp that be ... without that you cant open a bank account ... the only way you can buy a used or a brand new car be to pay for it in cash since you wont be able to get a bank loan for that good luck
 if you do get a residency permit ; then you can open a bank account . if you 're goingto need an auto loan ; the bank will only loan you money if your company or sponsor be on the `` approved list '' . if you 're not on their approved list ; you 're not out of luck because mashreq bank and al khaliji bank will loan you money even if you 're not on the list . this be assume you have a very good salary and some documentation to prove it . good luck !

 but will he even be able to get a driver 's license without the rp ? from what i understand you can drive for a week or two with some country ' driver ' license but not longer . so he would n't be able to either rent or buy ( register ) the car . also ; it 's illegal to work on a visit visa be n't it ? subject to arrest and deportation if catch ?
 i have a friend that be try to do the same a you . renting be expensive and if you buy a decent secondhand car you will have something to sell at the end of 12 month . my friend be here for 2 or 3 week every month and have be use a driver or rent a jeep at approximatley 5000-6000 qatar rials per month . i think you will need to get an international license or a short term qatar license every time you renew you visa . i think about 200 rials but not sure the problem be ownership of the car ; you will need to register the car and also get insurance . i be not sure about these detail . please if you find out any helpful detail please contact me 6730727
 i hope this do n't end up be a duplicate because i do n't yet see the 2nd answer i just submit . anyway ; first of all ; a car rental agency will rent you a car if you do n't have a qatari dl . however ; you will not be cover under any insurance umbrella . meaning ; if you get into an accident you 're 100 % responsible for all repair to the car up to the full prie of the car ( unless it 's deem the other driver fault ) . yes ; it 's technically illegal to work on a tourist or visit visa ; but some company will let you slide if you 're in the process of apply for an rp . you wo n't be able to buy and register a vehicle without an rp if you 're try for a bank loan . you wo n't even be able to open an account . bank wo n't lend money to anyone unless yuo 're on their `` approve list '' . however ; mashreq bank and al khaliji will give you a loan if yuo 're not on the list provide you have a good income and can put 10 % down . even if you pay cash ; i do n't think you can register or insure a new/used car without an rp .
 i understand your position very well ; but remember you can not process anything without a residence permit ( rp ) . when i say anything i mean it - bank account ; driver 's licence ; vehicle registration ; etc . talk to your company and try to get a work permit and then an rp . failing which ask the company for an allowance for a regular taxi . there be many individual provide personal taxi service - although there be measure to ban this practice . once again remember without an rp you can not process anything in qatar . and if you meet with an accident while drive without an rp the police ot the other party will simply put the blame on you .

 as far a i know ultrasound be not harmful a they use sound wave to see the baby and not radiation . my wife have one with almost every visit ( we be in doha ) but not every two week . but at least every month ; some month more because we go to get second opinion .
 i be follow up with hamad hospital for 3 month and i be almost 21 week . usually they do the ultra sound once a month until the 32 -34 week when they start to do it every 2 week in order to make sure the mother and baby be healthy and know when the labor will start . i have ask that question and they ultra sound technician say that ; if the pregnant lady do the ultra sound over 25 time during her first trimester it will be harmful for the baby . because the first trimester be when the development of the baby and his/her organ be develop . by the end of second trimester to the end of the third be only gain of weight and size . hope this help www.bastook.com
 no ; at diagnostic level that too at late period of pregnancy it be safe.it be well to follow hamad hosp suggestion
 there be no harm in do frequent ultra sound test

 i have ultrasound do every month when i be pregnant ( that be during the time when i go to private clinic ) then i switch to hamad hospital and i have three more in the last trimester of pregnancy.no complication just to make sure everything be ok with my baby .

 oh my ; do n't think of that . surely 2 hour be way too much time to spend on buy a car .
 you have to pay atleast 10 ; 000qr more if you buy car over loan . the loan also depend on you salary . the bank will cut min . 1500qr per month and that also depend on how many year you want to pay loan ; 3/5 . good contact with any showroom person .
 car loan rate be usually `` flat '' the average/normal bank rate be between 4.5 to 6 % ( promos exclude ) so if you be buy a car ( eg . crv - qar.100 ; 000/- ) on a 5 year loan @ 5 % ; add 2.5 % - 3 % processing fee + 25 % interest + first year insurance say 5 % ... your total to pay bank be 100 ; 000+2500+25000+5000 i.e . ; 132 ; 000 therefore monthly instalment would be 132 ; 000/60 = qar.2 ; 208/- and it could vary slightly depend on the grace period you choose or bank offer for the first repayment . you can get the same term from car dealer 's inhouse financing ( if bankloan doesnt work ) but the rate could be 7.5-8.5 % good luck

 where can i buy vga to hdmi cable ? ? where can i buy vga to hdmi cable ? ? how much ? ? thanks
 you can check carrefour or technical care center.. both in city center mall
 you can get dvi to hdmi any where i have see in lulu d ring . not sure about vga to hdmi
 how many do you need ? i 'll ask my techie friend if he have one .
 do n't think you will get a vga to hdmi cable . you would need an adapter to convert the signal . vga be analogous signal and hdmi be digital . i have n't see a direct vga to hdmi adapter around here . you can always get a vga to dvi adapter from any computer shop and dvi to hdmi cable from any electronics shop . but be aware that this will only give you a video signal ; no audio .

 you ca n't drive in egypt with your qatari driving liciense . you need to first get an international driving license here in qatar and then you can drive there in egypt with your international driving license .
 you can not drive in egypt with your qatari d/l ; you must obtain egyptian d/l first . have a nice journey
 i beleive you can still take a interntaional drivers lic ense from qatar for the time being.. : )
 gcc driving license can i drive in egypt with my qatari drive license ? and can it be change to egyptian drive license or do i need to go through drive test etc . ?
 qatar driving license general qatari resident must carry a valid qatari driving licence . ggc state nationals be permit to use their national driving licenses . as a visitor ( other national ) to qatar ; your national driving licence be acceptable for seven day from your date of arrival in the country . if you wish to rent a car for long than the seven day ( but do not intend to take up permanent residence ) you will require a temporary driving license . if you be keen to drive during your first few month in qatar ; it be worth obtain an international licence before you get here . an international driving license be valid for 6 month from the date of your arrival in qatar . getting a driving license depend on what country you be from . citizens from most western country such a canada and the u.k. can change their drving license for qatari one . other nationality have to do a driving test which be actually quite difficult . in most case the procedure for issue a local licence just include an eye test and a simple write test . however ; it be necessary to hold a residence permit in order to apply for a qatari driving licence . the procedure temporary driving license the following item be require for a temporary driver 's license ( tdl ) : a ) original driver license from home country . b ) eye examination . c ) process fee qr156 ( about $ 45 ) . d ) four personal photo ( with eye glass ; if require ) . e ) copy of passport an appointment for the eye examination will be set up for you by the hr department and you will be inform of the time and date for the appointment . permanent drivers license converting the temporary driver 's license to a permanent driver 's license require the following : a ) temporary drivers license ( tdl ) . b ) two photo . c ) copy of passport and residence permit . d ) process fee of qr156 ( about $ 45 ) .

 `` make a difference or make way '' should you need heavy duty back pack i get two brand new on sale . the north face from usa
 sleep bag that you buy here wont work there coz it winter season in the himalayan region and you need small ; and light sleep bag that can withstand temperature upto -10 degree celcius or more .
 i buy a back pack from souq asiri for 180 riyal . held everything that i need . bought a sleep bag from city centre for 65qr and the moment i use it ; i start regret my decision . i be still dead freezing . i be paralyse from one low limb ; so i have to carry what i be able to carry and most of the time the stuff i take with me think that i might need it sometime later on be not even use . so the next time i go ; i will just take myself and some extra cash with me a everything be available wherever you go . i go to pakistan to the karakoram and cross over to china . the best trip of my life and i will be go back again . visit hunza in pakistan and karakul lake in china when you go there and make your way to east to tibet . its amazing .

 career prospect and personal development opportunity be tremendous in this dynamic and vibrant environment . we ; at qatar airways take our recruitment and selection process very seriously . while every effort be take to treat all our candidate fairly ; it be vital that we select people with the desired capability that be essential to our continued success . -minimum age of 20 year -minimum arm reach of 212cms ( on tip toe ) -minimum high school education/ o level ; with fluency in write and speak english ( ability to speak another language be an asset ) -an excellent level of health and fitness -a willingness to relocate to doha ; qatar ideally ; have an outgoing personality with good interpersonal skill and the ability to work in a team environment be an advantage . good luck ! ! !

 gps work exceptionally well in desert country like the gulf a there be very less tree cover . desert storm be a gps war ... lol you can not lose your way even in low visiblity time like sand stroms etc . while in place with very dense tree cover ; gps signal be interrupt ... .its definitely a problem in kerala ... .because of so much coconut and other tree cover . gps war would prove ineffective there ... lol most of the phone have 2 mode of connection : 1 . assisted gps will use cell site to connect ; quick connect ; but it have charge . this be usless in place where there be no cell-site like sealine ... etc . i suggest to switch it off unless you literally can not get a gps signal even after 15minutes . 2 . integrated gps uses the true satellite signal to connect . it take about 1 to 3 minute to find a minimum of 3 satellite ; depend on where you stand . it can not function without reach 3 or 4 satellite . advantages of phones over stand alone sat nav unit be : 1 . you carry the phone everywhere ... .chances of forget it be next to zero . 2 . you can send your coordinate a mms so someone comming to meet you in a remote place ... .say you be meet a group in the desert . 3 . convenience ... it have everything in a single unit ... .especially the camera . 4 . its dirt cheap if you split the cost a below : ( a ) phone ; ( b ) camera ; ( c ) music/video player ( d ) camera ( e ) gps < b > best gps mobile be samsung omnia qr 1850 < /b > ( carrefour ) 8gb card ; 5mp camera ; excellent wifi ; due to windows os ; touch screen ; garmin xt mobile gps software ;

 women stare just as much a men ; particularly at western people . apart from the rudeness i encounter from other woman occasionally ; and the competition to have have the most baby ; i do n't find living here a problem .
 it be safe but i be a working mum and i find these diffciulties ... .i have a business visa and could not sponsor a nnanny therefore i be leave with maid who have company visa and or be illegal or not experienced but immediately look foir the next job . i test three but find none to satisfactory - my child be 2 and 4 so i keep them home a the fee for school a driver and the time the kid would have to get up be crazy i have a one hour commute each way so my day be waste drive not with my kid . the near park to my home could be reach by car only ; and the traffic sometimes make it a two hour exercise just in drive . the hospital be ok but the public one be accessible for appointment during work hour and the private one expensive . i have a contract that allow no unpaid leave and have penalty for missed work even if your kid be sick . needless to say when my husabnd want to return home and resume his work and i have be unable to hire help and my son have an epileptic seizure - i give notice and come home . as an expatriate worker with family i have find much friendly country to work in where large percentage of your pay stay with you and be not absorb by high rent school fee and food price . you need a good salary if you want to do all you want . in your contract get a vila provide and education for kid and a vihicle rent allowance and you can have an ok expat lifestyle . it depend on your salary - a labourer might be con into come for 280 riyal a month - god know how they survive . i get 14 ; 000 + and i decide i be well take 40 ; 000 aud per annum salary cut and work somewhere cost be cheap and lifestyle more family friendly i still do n't have a job but i be very happy with my decision to prioritse my kid and leave qatar for the qataris- mostly i find people with family where the woman or both parent work less then satisfy with the cost access to care and quality of care for their kid - people on huge salary who can afford to join the intercontinental beach club and the wife and kid spend every after schoool moment there seem satisfied - live in a compound with play facility and you may be ok . good luck .

 plugs from uk ? hello - be just wonder about move stuff over from the uk - will our electricals work out there - dvd ; tv . fridge etc etc - or do we need converter plug or something ? thanks
 3 pin plug will work in qatar no problem a the socket be the same ( they be the last time i be there in 2004 ) tv be not sure a we buy ours in qatar . we buy a dvd player in qatar and it work fine in the uk with uk buy dvds but again they be cheap enough to buy in qatar .
 plug socket here be all 3-pin uk style . however ; you might want to bring a stock of 3-pin to 2-pin adaptor with you because anything you by out here will be 2-pin ; and the adapter you buy here be very low quality and i 've see many catch fire or melt .
 so if all the plus socket be 3 pin why be the product 2 pin ? so do you mean i need a 2 pin to 3 pin adaptor ? i be confused ... sorry !
 i expect plug socket be 3-pin co qatar use to be protect by the british . just a guess . appliances be 2-pin co they come from asia i think . it 's juts one of many wonderful thing that defy logic here in qatar . you 'll need adapter that plug into the 3-pin wall socket and take a 2-pin plug .
 have some patience and change the plug on new item to 3-pin plug . i hate the adapter here ; a previously mention the quality be rubbish and they can melt .
 the same applies to the 3-pin plug you buy here a the adapter - they be cheap and prone to catch fire . best to bring your own from the uk .
 while you may find someone to install it ; i believe the reason you ca n't find them here be that be `` radio control '' they have to be allow by the government ( in order that the frequency use do n't interfere with any of the official radio frequency ) - at least that 's what i be tell 8 year ago .
 sorry i want to say government not police
 these device utilise the unlicensed frequency range which do n't interfere with any gov official radio freq range ; just like your cordless phone . any skilled auto electrician should be able to install it ; but be careful unskilled technician can damage your car . these remote starter be available for sale at any car ' access shop ( around 500 qr ) ; i have one for sale if you be interested ( brand new ; still in box ) .
 as a single `` user '' perhaps you do n't have to worry . i inquire with a north american manufacturer in order to import and sell them here - they advise that one of the document require be a government permit for the radio frequency concern . as i say ; it be 8 year ago . times change .

 export my car i be plan to export my 2005 toyat - camary to india ( kerala ) ; please let me know which be the cheap way of send it and hows do these work ?
 for sure you can ship your car for the purpose . its call a an escort . it be the same procedure that you take the vehicle to other gcc place . you have to apply for a permission to export the vehicle a an escort . but make sure that the vehicle be register under your name and not in the bank . otherwise you have to obtain an noc from the bank . also there be an additional charge for insurance . then you have to consult a shipment company and you have to make a two way bill . once it reach there in india no need to pay any taxes . as per my knowledge you can use the vehicle there in india up to 1 year

 technical comparison ... toyota land cruiser prado 2010 - 2011 engine gearbox power ( hp ) torque ( nm ) fuel econ ( l/100km ) 0-100 kph ( sec ) top spd ( kph ) 4.0 v6 4wd 6m/5a 271hp 381nm 12.5-13.0 8.5-9.0sec 200 good off-road ability ; 2nd-row space ; cargo room bad base engine power ; weak 3-door version ; dull on-road handling ; pricey option mazda cx-9 2010 - 2011 engine gearbox power ( hp ) torque ( nm ) fuel econ ( l/100km ) 0-100 kph ( sec ) top spd ( kph ) 3.7 v6 fwd/4wd 6a 273hp 367nm 13.1 8.3sec 194* good sharp look ; good handling ; roomy enough interior bad below-average fuel economy ; heavy ; off-road ability ; pricey & ofcourse hell of difference between price ...
 cx9 be more crossoverish whereas prado be a proper suv and look like one too . a toyota be definitely more reliable than mazda .
 car comparison : prado to mazda cx9 how be the comparison between prado and mazda cx9 ? which one would be a good buy ?
 the only advantage of prado be the resale value . both be not real off-road option . so for on-road cx-9 be much more fun to drive ( acceleration & stability ) and much good look . the myth of the toyota be more reliable be a very local belief that have no fact to support it . also do n't fall for the claim of low cost maintenance of toyota . i have a lc ; the brake master and booster cost 8000 qar which be double the cadilac escalade that be claim to be one of the high when it come to maintenance cost .
 do n't sell you car before buying.. go for good option & comfort rather price it before buy ! !

 it 's direct employment against employment via recruitment agency
 recruitment agency be only after their commission so be generally good to go direct ; unless the company be disreputable ... ... ..in which case there be many here .
 i be a direct hire . what you need to do be check first the company hire you . for me it be easy because i know some compatriot who work for the company in it different branch here in the gulf region . also please check the process in poea ; i believe they have change it last year . so the process i go through be not the same anymore where i have to go through each step myself . as far a i know it be not anymore `` direct hire '' or `` name hire '' per se a you will need to have your document process through an employment agency and not by yourself .

 - the labour law state that employer must provide housing or housing allowance . - the employment contract set the term and condition for employment which should include amount of housing or provision of accomodation - the employer should not claim back any money pay for housing as long a this have not be previously agree . - she can complain at the labour department on c ring road ; but this will of course put her in trouble and the company may then terminate her contract and send her back home . - the advise be she need to reach an agreement with her employer . - one question be if the other company provide her with accomdation ; be that for free ? be it agree with her employer ? - it be very tricky but what do her contract say ? hope this help

 supply and demand ; capitalism 101 pure and simple . if enough well educate ; well train ; well experience ; well qualified 'asians ' ( japanese usually get high offer ) refuse to work for a quarter of salary of a comparable europeans then in theory the company will have to offer more to attract them . unfortunately ; in practice for every asian that refuse to work for a quarter of the european 's salary there be ten more line up to work for one-fifth . i think the question should be re-phrased : why would company hire a european/american/australian/japanese etc for four time the salary of a comparably qualify 'asians ' ? ? ? ? ? cheers sk

 hi alexa ; i 'm ask a rethorical question about why would company hire a 'westerner ' ( i prefer to use this term ) for 4 time the salary of 'asians ' . according to a pure cost-benefit point of view ; they would expect and should get a quadruple of productivity from the westerner . question be ; do they ( company or state for this matter ) get what they bargain for ? the answer be ( if indeed it be true that westerner be pay 4 time more ; a proposition that need to be investigate far ) a resounding yes ; a we can see more westerner be arrive and base on the cost benefit principle above ; company feel that they still get ahead by hire westerner . here we assume that no one ( company or state ) be stupid enough to prefer lose instead of win . there 's a catch though . by 'productivity ' they may not only refer to tangible thing such a amount of product you produce or sale achievement . it may also include thing such a prestige ( ie . this real estate company be under british management ) or something a cynical ( a another poster put it ) fear or subconcious inferiority complex . true or nor ; i do n't know ... . myself ; if i think i be underpaid ( dont really care what my colleages get ) ; then i 'll try to negotiate a good deal . if i can not get a good deal ; then i try to prove that i be underpaid by look at a good job that give me more . if i can not find a good job ; then may be i 'm pay exactly what my market worth be ... ... . might as well shut my mouth and enjoy ... ...  i follow carefully report and review on car regard durability ; maintenance and reliability . to be honest ; dodge and chrysler ( include jeep ) be among the least reliable car around . a recent study by forbes in the usa show that these manufacturer along with gmc top their list of least reliable car . a list which no japanese or korean manufacturer make ! interestingly ; car manufacture by ford for the past five year be among the most reliable . jeeps have be well know for their mountain and dune climb capability ; but when it come to road driving ; you 'd better slow down before buy one and see all other alternative . a ford explorer may be a good choice if you be look for an american car at the same price tag ( or even cheap ) than the jeep . but for qatar ; if you can ; get your self one of these : 1- toyota prado . 2- nissan pathfinder or x-terra 3- mitsubishi pajero 4- honda pilot they be the least to lose at reselling by order . they be also very reliable and have a large range of option to choose from .

 britexpat ; yes ; someone who be employ by a company here and on a seperate rp . employer / sponsor have nothing to do with marriage of employee . provided both bride and groom have valid rps in qatar ; the family court in qatar will only ask for a letter of approval from the father of the bride if he be not physically present in the court during the wedding ; and an attested/translated civic record or something that prove the bride be not marry . in addition to do a medical test and bring 2 witness to court ; there be nothing else to it . however ; keep in mind that the family court here will only marry a muslim male to a muslim or christian female . they will not carry out the marriage of the groom be not a muslim or if the bride be not a muslim nor christian . only one exception to this rule : female cabin crew work at qatar airways .
 yes ichwill i do get marry here accord to our religious rite and then have to get a formal one do at our embassy and submit the noc to my embassy and attest it . when i have my child here i have to submit a similar letter state i be sponsor by my company to hmc ... ..
 we have that do at a relative house here . it wasnt the entire ceremony a there be restriction to that and not possible to bring in a priest so it be a simple ceremony but we get registerd at the embassy legalise it .
 that clear a lot of thing . i be specifically talk about the qatari family court . some expat community in qatar have some kind of marriage official over here ; whether it be at their embassy or outside . in my case ; since my wife and i be of different nationality ; we could not get marry at the embassy .
 ichwill - some law in this country just amaze me . different rule for diff nationality for the same issue . at the end of the day it all boil down to money ... dont understand why they cant just take the cash and make thing simple ! ! ! !
 as far a the family court be concern only one law apply to all nationality . they genuinely do not care what our nationality be . they only care about religion ... i be not say that be any good .
 ichwill - yeah that too ... .case to case scenario actually . in this instance yes it religion but there be many other issue pertain to visa etc and every nationality have something diff to produce . believe me the ppl sit at the counter themselves have differ opinion on what papaers need to be submit for what ... .recent hair raise exp with my labour card ... . & ^ & & %

 honestly - do n't bother call a they will never answer ! forget fax and email as well ! you have to go down in person to the animal resource department on airport road and talk to someone there . they 're open between 6.30am and 1.30pm sunday - thursday . if it 's one or two cat they will lend you trap that you can set ; trap the cat and take in before 10am for neuter . they can be collect the following morning and you can re-release them into your area if it 's a large population then they will probably arange to come and trap them themselves and release them .

 prescription for regular medication could anyone tell me how i go about get a prescription for medication that i need to take regularly . i move to doha in 10 day time ; i have search this site but can not seem to find the information i need . thanks louise
 you should consult a doctor fist and tell him about your medication . he/she will provide you the necessary prescription or advice .
 sorry for the spell mistake `` fist '' should be `` first ''
 you can consult any physician in any doha clinic ; and have yourself examine ; then they would write you the prescription that you need ...
 certain medication be control by prescription ; like anti biotics ; steroid and psychatric drug . most others you can avail over the counter ; if the drug be control you need to get a prescription
 even for control drug ; you ca n't have a permanent prescription ; you have to consult your physician everytime ( frequently at least once in 2 month ) to obtain presecriptions for regular medicine .

 final exit i be work a a web developer with one company . my visa status be personal labour ( `` aamil shaksiya '' ) . this visa be under by boss 's brother . my boss promise me to change the profession of my visa ; but since 2 yr . he could n't make it . now i want to have a final exit and leave qatar . but my bos be not permit me to go . i have no contract with my company . can anybody suggest me a way that i could get final exit .
 talk to him in a polite manner and request that you want to have a final exit . draft a resignation letter and goto him and request in a kind manner and take his signatory on it ; once everything be do then no one can stop you ; if you still face any problem then goto hrd and raise them your concern .
 who be your sponsor ? go talk to him and say you want to go on vacation . then just dont come back and make the same mistake again .
 you can file a complaint to labor department if your sponsor will not let you exit the country and give all that be require by law ( gratuity ; free ticket to country of origin ) it 's not because thing be difficult that we do n't dare ; it 's because we do n't dare that make thing difficult !

 armada ? is n't that in a different class to the other 2 ? armada have a 5.6 v8 engine and be more suitable for a family car that only go to the sand ( beach ; dune ; etc . ) rarely or lightly . the prado and pajero both offer v6 engine with good ( if not very good ) off-road capability . the i4 prado be not consider good due to lack of power . both these v6 car be quite reliable too ( i do n't know enough about the armada ; though ) and can carry up to 7 people with the driver . maintenance wise ; toyota and nissan can be difficult due to the long queue at their service station . otherwise ; you can try your luck with non-dealership service workshop . i 'm sure there be a lot of good one out there that can work on these three model . you can head to driverarabia dot com for more info on most car .

 i would think 9-10k be reasonable a a basic salary for 4 year of experience . however ; i do think you need to be pay additional allowance for accommodation ; transport etc . also make sure your annual flight and medical insurance be cover . all the best .
 family visa be not a problem . once you come in and complete your residency formality ; you can process your wife 's visa .
 firstly i take it this be 8000 per month ? if so then no do n't accept unless the contractor provide you with housing at the very least . rent in doha be very expensive . the average rent for a 2 bedroom apartment in doha with furniture be at least 6000 qr a month . as for family visa 's i do n't know enough to give you accurate information . but if you have children who be at school then you would also want the contractor to pay tutition fee a school fee be expensive a well .

 if you have permament work visa here in qatar not any business or visit visa ; and meet the salary requirment by labour dept min or above = qr.7500 then you be fully eligible to apply for your daughter visa a family visa . you need to get 1 . salary statement from you employee 2 . bank statement for 6 month of your salary account 3. your company cr / computer card copy 4 . your qtel account number / electricy number of you house . 5. your daughter brith certificate .  is there a cure for rheumatoid arthritis ? my mother suffers from rheumatoid arthritis and have undergo many treatment include ayurvedic ; acupuncture and homeopathy but none give permanent resoluations . she 's 54 . can someone share ; suggest or recommend any kind of treatment ?
 yes ; it be . did you try acupressure ? if you need more detail ; call me 5841088 ck
 no cure ; but there be way to minimize the symptions and lesson the damage to the joint . i see a r.a. doctor at hamad regularly . i be so much good after have start humira injection every two week . i also regularly take methotrexate ( once a week ) . i have be on prednisone but have wean myself off of that ; thank goodness ; but at the time ; i really need it . it be the first thing that ever help me . i call it a miracle drug . without these medication i be a basketcase . now i be fine . i have regular blood test every 4 to 8 week to keep an eye on any problem arise from the medication . my ra be diagnose in nov 2008 . good luck ! !
 there be no known cure for rheumatoid arthritis ; but many different type of treatment can alleviate symptom and modify the disease process . alleviating the current symptom ; and prevent the future destruction of the joint with the result handicap if the disease be leave unchecked . ra should generally be treat with at least one specific anti-rheumatic medication . < a href= '' http : //www.fitnesshealthzone.com/yoga/top-10-yoga-poses-for-relieving-headaches-and-shoulder-pain/ '' > yoga pose < /a >

 thank you so much magicdragon . does that mean they have to give the eosb ( min . 3 week ) even if it 's not mention in our actual contract ? is it law that a small non-govenment company have to give a letter of no objection if they end your contract 5 month before the contract finish due to their not have work ? also : a ) if i/we cancel our rp and leave the country without a no objection letter ; be there any restriction on me ( or our family ) be allow back into the country on a visitor 's visa ; obtain from the airport ? b ) if work cancel my rp whilst we be out of the country ; and we do n't have a no objection letter ; can we enter the country again on a visitor visa obtain at the airport ? is there any site to go to and check your status of rp ? how would you be notify if your rp have be cancel ?
 yes ; in order for your company to have opt out of the end-of-service gratuity it would have to be in your contract . otherwise ; it 's there . secondly ; i do n't know of any rule that say company must give an noc in such-and-such circumstance . it seem to be totally up to their discretion . finally ; if you have be on a family visa you do n't need an noc to re-enter after your rp be canceled/expired . only the worker need an noc and he/she always need an noc within the two year time frame . mandi

 hope this help : ) you will be give a form to complete with a list of the relevant document : approval letter from work ; bank statement of salary for the last six month ( for non-government employee ) ; marriage certificate ; child 's birth certificate and education certificate ( although you do n't always need these in practice ) . the last three should be certify ; but in practice you probably do n't need to . photocopies be acceptable . you also need passport photo of yourself ; your spouse and your child . read more : http : //www.qatarvisitor.com/index.php ? cid=413 & pid=978 & cname=travel & pname=visas # family # ixzz13pza3kza

 the procedure be simple but it take some time . you will go to ahli and tell them that you want to repay your loan in full . they will make the paperwork and contact you . normally there be no tax besides the leftover amount you have to pay back . but this be qatar ... nothing be normal when it come to banking . so they might charge you ... why do n't you just give them a call and ask .
 i think ( when i take a loan from hsbc ) you will have to pay a high interest during the first year if you want to clear your loan . after the first year you pay only 1 % on the balance amount and get a clearance letter . but it be always good to check with the customer service at the bank a sometimes rule change and each bank may have their own policy . however ; qatar central bank set the rule ; so be sure the bank be not rip you off .
 yes they do apply a penalty . and i think it 's 1 or 2 % of the remain amount without interest . so basically if you have to pay 100 qr ( no interest include ) you will end up pay 101 qr . they apply this penalty because they be not entitle to charge you the interest anymore . banks ... ca n't live with them ; ca n't live without them ...
 they apply the penalty because by repay your loan early they be not make any more money off the loan ( in the form of interest ) .
 be it same for car loan also ?

 renting law in qatar state that if your rp be cancel the landlord must refund all pay rent and return the cheque . the normal notice period be 1 month but you be not responsible if you be fire without notice and your rp cancel . these people be crook ; dont let them take you for a greedy ride .

 chaging work before the end of the 1st year be it possible to change job during your first year in qatar ? the current sponsor will give release and noc .
 if i 'm work for 6 month to may current sponsor and i will resign with noc ( release paper from my sponsor ) . as per advice to my next sponsor that i will exit to point of origin and they will just send the new visa & plane ticket this be possible ?
 that be possible . but your visa should be cancel by your sponsor and you need `` noc to return within the 2yrs ban period '' . note : noc to transfer sponsor be different from noc to return w/in 2yrs banned period .

 you will be ban for 2yrs once your rp be cancel ; which be why you need to reassure that your current employer will grant you an noc to return . please note that your rp must be cancel prior to exit ; otherwise your new employer wont be able to apply a new visa for you . once you exit the state ; and with an noc on hand ; thing will be fine with you ; in god 's will ! but change sponsor within a year working of the same sponsor with a work visa/permanent visa stamp on your passport and without exit will not be possible for you a per immigration rules . you can double check with your company 's pro ; though .
 you will be able to change sponsorship within the first year . that be the answer i be give when i try in 2004 even though the company be prepared to give me an noc and i have another job and sponsor line up .

 your passport copy 2 ) your rp and id 3 ) your brother passport 4 ) your company noc 5 ) your house agreement 6 ) typed arabic papaer 7 ) 200 qr dont forget to attach your marriage certificate also because you be not allow to sponsor your brother if you be not marry and at the same time your family should be here with valid residence visa because if you be single ; immigration will not allow you . the only thing you can do if you be single be to apply a tourist visa or business visa ...
 1- fill a family-visit-visa aplication form ( online or at any typist for 5 qr ) preferably in arabic 2- passport copy of yours and your visitor 's ; 3- company letter state -your salary ( must be > 5.000qr ) and -that they provide u family accomodation ( if not ; provide no.4 ) and -no objection from your sponsor that u bring ur family for visit . 4- rental contract ( stamp by baladiya ? ) 5- qr . 200 processing fee for each visa but in credit card ; no cash at jiane ; ur wrong . i 'm single and i bring my parent every year .
